summary: Play as Garok the orc, the true heir of the Orc Throne. This pack contains Garok the Orc as a fully playable character.

name: Sango Fighter 2
summary:
FROM THE PAGES OF HISTORY BEGINS A CENTURY OF WAR.

In the days of China's Eastern Han Dynasty, the young emperor's power was suppressed by an evil regent as traitorous eunuchs plunged the court into chaos. The Han bloodline weakened, and the land was split amongst the strong.

It was a chaotic era when bones filled the fields and fires were seen for thousands of miles. From the flames emerged the brilliant Cao Cao, the warm-hearted Liu Bei, the wise Sun Quan, the powerful Lü Bu and the tyrant Dong Zhuo. From beginnings both low and high, these men rose to power in the third century to compete for the prize: the throne of China.

From the pages of history begins a century of war. The battle, one sure to split the sky and break the earth, is now unstoppable...

name: Save Her From the Zombies!
summary: You're trapped in a mansion infested with zombies... Will you be able to protect the girl you love from certain death?!

name: Sanki
summary: It's winter. Let's go sledding. Ride the slope until you stop or crash.

name: Saffron Fields
summary: An arcade game about a little brave tank fighting terrorists and drug dealing PMCs. Play campaign or endless mode with your friends. Brawl enemies out of fight. Defeat mighty bosses. Bring peace to the Saffron Fields!

name: Save her, from dreams
summary: Enter the dream, save the one you love.

name: Save and Survive
summary: The player needs to survive in the forest. Where dangerous monsters live.

name: Sailing
summary: Simulation game where you compete in top-level yachting competitions.

name: Saint Spell's Love Guide to the Magical Student's Spellbook
summary: Saint Spell's Love Guide to the Magical Student's Spellbook is a dating and friendship simulator of the famous magical conservatory, Saint Spell! In your first week of school, meet 29 magical students, practice some special spells, brew a love potion, or simply slack off... The game contains 14,051 dialogue blocks, containing 155,452 words, 504 menus, 140 images, and 35 screens.

name: Sandmen
summary: Sandmen is a free, German 2D point-and-click adventure. You are sleeping and are awakened by some voices who turn out to be sandmen. Since you saw them, they want to take you with them unless you manage get them a person who commits suicide. The game is controlled via the mouse and is inventory based. Aside from the cut-scenes there is no music or sound.

name: Satan's Castle
summary:
This game is an action & strategy.
While attacking you can summon monsters at the same time and fight.

name: Salmon Run
summary: A top down action game for the Atari 8-bit featuring a playable salmon.

name: S.A.I.A Awakening: A Robothorium Visual Novel
summary: Discover how it all began and explore Robothorium's universe through the eyes of Agent 22, a spy commissioned by Jaklov to stake Alan out.

name: Sachova Hra
summary: Find out what lies behind the seemingly banal chess game. Close your eyes and travel across memory and time in the footsteps of an almost forgotten human destiny in the interactive radio drama The Chess Game.

name: SanctuaryRPG
summary: Set in a retro ASCII-art world, SanctuaryRPG is a humorous and strategic turn-based dungeon crawling adventure. Drawing heavy inspiration from both Roguelikes and Japanese RPGs, the game was meticulously designed to offer a truly compelling gameplay experience fused with a robust action-rpg inspired combat system.

name: Sanrio Shanghai
summary: Sanrio Shanghai is a Puzzle game, developed by SAS Sakata and published by Character Soft, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Salt Thrust
summary: infinitely bouncing ball on the sea in your library

name: Save My Human
summary: This is the story about a little girl who is taken to an evil world inside a video game, and her dog embarks on an adventure to save her. The dog will not be alone, he will encounter other pets who are also searching for their owners.

name: Sapiens League
summary: Play for free and compare your skills with friends in this exciting competitive multiplayer game.

name: Save and Conquer
summary: This is a 2D defense game that depicts the near future that may arise from climate change. Unlike the defense game, which is automatically attacked by traditional turrets, it is an attractive game that requires you to defeat the enemy by operating the turret directly with limited power.

name: Saddle Up with Pippa Funnell Olympic Medalist
SandRipper
summary: Tear across the desert, obliterating wave after wave with speed and precision. A punchy arcade shooter with unlimited weapon combinations!

name: Sakura Flamingo Archives
summary:
Sakura Flamingo Archives is a compilation of Milestone's five arcade shooters:

- Chaos Field
- Radirgy
- Karous
- Illvelo
- Radirgy Noa

It also features a "Mixture" mode, and a "Death" mode, both of which could be played with any ship from the games mentioned above.

name: Sauro
summary: Horizontal scrolling submarine game. Guide your submarine through a hail of depth charges, mines, enemy ships and subs. Collect fuel, triple guns, missiles, and shield on the way. Fight a tough sub at the end of each section.

name: Safari Hunt
summary: Safari Hunt is a hunting game where one must shoot as many animals with a limited amount of ammunition. One must shoot the various game animals to acquire enough points to advance to the next round.

name: Save My Sister
summary: After a young girl is kidnapped by a human trafficking gang, an ex army officer with PTSD has to fight to rescue her. A Third Person shooter with film-noir/neo-noir style

name: Samurai Shodown: Cham Cham
summary: This digital purchase will unlock the DLC character "CHAM CHAM" for your copy of SAMURAI SHODOWN.

name: SameGame
summary: Yet another edition of SameGame with its own spin, this time for Android.

name: Salamander Capital
summary:
Mud and metal and the smell of rotting in humidity. A visual novel by Lichen Euchella.
A submission for Visual Novel Cup 2, 07/2023.

name: Saikyo no Mahjong: 100 Mannin no Tame no Mahjong Dojo
Savant: Ascent - Anniversary Edition
summary: Ascend to greater heights in this fully remastered edition of Savant - Ascent! Includes brand new content, stages, bosses, and an entire original soundtrack by music artist Savant.

name: SafeGuard
summary: This game is a first person shooting game, players could choose different characters to join match, cooperate to occupy the stronghold.

name: SangRaciner
summary: This adventure game projects you in 1911, in France, in the Bataillon’s estate. Play as one of the two playable characters and discover the history of this place. Explore the huge property, help the survivors, face the magical creatures, solve the puzzles. Do you think you will come out alive?

name: Sandcastle Builder
summary: Browser game inspired by the comic XKCD 1190, "Time", and its associated forum thread and subculture.

name: Saboteur
summary: A Saboteur has infiltrated a science team on a space station, trying to bring it down. The Security forces must now find an eliminate him, without killing any innocent scientists, before the station goes critical.

name: Save Christmas
summary: You and Santa Claus flew to distribute gifts to children. Passing one of the forests, Santa Claus lost control and crashed into a tree, all the gifts scattered through the forest with zombies.

name: Sapan
summary: Target at the right angle from the right point and destroy the blocks as you solve puzzles.

name: Save Them
summary: A Minimalist horror-themed Platformer. Guide your way through increasingly twisted landscapes as the mysterious narrative unfolds. Not everything is as it seems - your journey to Save Them begins here.

name: Sandbox
summary: The goal of the game is to collect 22 bills. To collect them, you need to press the "play" button and move to the sandbox level.

name: Santa Simulator
summary: You ring the mysterious bell. Next minute, you're riding in Santa's sleigh, dropping presents in chimneys. Welcome to Santa Simulator where kids squeal with delight and adults become kids again.

name: Santa Rockstar HD
summary:
A guitar rhythm game featuring a badass Santa travelling the world playing Rock/Metal versions of classic Christmas carols.

Slay guitar solos as a tattooed, heavy metal loving Santa. Grind on with your band of pierced, leather wearing, reindeer – all while riding on your sleigh and delivering gifts ’round the world.

Santa Rockstar keeps you rocking-on around the Christmas tree with holiday favorites, such as: Jingle Bells, Carol of the Bells, March of the Nutcracker, Silent Night, God Rest ye Gentlemen, We Wish You A Merry Christmas, Joy to the World, Santa is in Trouble, Little Bells for You, Hark the Herald, Snowball Fight, Three Wise Men, Santa’s Journey Begins.

This Santa’s probably not checking to see if you’re naughty or nice, making Santa Rockstar a perfect gift for those that don’t do Christmas Carols and prefer to, shred open gifts, tip-back some eggnog, and party on!

name: Sand: A Leo Parker Adventure
summary: Sand is part puzzle game, part adventure, part graphic novel. Unravel the story of the long-dead Pharaoh Anat as you solve puzzles and discover clues across a variety of Egypt-themed settings. Delve tombs, trace clues in the stars themselves, haggle with merchants, unlock ancient doors and journey back to ancient Egypt itself in search of answers.

name: Sailor Moon Drops
summary: Mobile puzzle Sailor Moon game for both the iOS and Android. The player swaps gems to gain items and defeat enemies. The game was shut down internationally after March 28, 2019

name: Samurai Revenge
summary: Samurai Revenge is an action clear version to clear the level. The game has 7 levels. There are several different styles of enemies such as swordsmen and archers, as well as various traps that require quick response.

name: Sailor Fuku Senshi Felis
summary: A UFO came and abducted three girls. Their classmate rode her grandfather fighter spaceship and hurried to rescue!

name: Saints Row: Front to Back Cosmetic Pack
summary: Half the citizens of Santo Ileso don’t know whether they’re coming or going, and neither will you with this marvellously multifaceted Cosmetic Pack celebrating the Weird Wild West! Don your hat, pull up your cowboy boots, and strap in to your custom Hollybird. Keep It Strange Santo!

name: Saints Row: Merry Saintsmas Cosmetic Pack
summary: If you simply cannot wait for Santa's massive old sack, then look no further than the Merry Saintsmas Cosmetic Pack and bring some seasonal stylings to the streets of Santo Ileso whenever and wherever you want!

name: Sakura Succubus 7
summary: After successfully wooing Stephania, the princess of Astoria, Hiroki takes her on a tour of Tokyo alongside Elizabeth, her maid, and Cosmos, the ditzy, airheaded e-girl. Things take a turn for the sinister, however, when somebody begins to stalk them…

name: Samurai Sword VR
summary: It's Edo Japan. The country is in chaos. Awaken your inner samurai as you dash through and across thrilling locations, using shuriken and your katana to cut down obstacles and foes!

name: Saviors of Sapphire Wings/Stranger of Sword City Revisited: Limited Edition
summary:
A physical limited edition of the game bundle for the Nintendo Switch.

Includes:
- Saviors of Sapphire Wings / Stranger of Sword City Revisited for Nintendo Switch
- "Sapphire Wing Emblem" Enamel Pin
- "Dungeons and Refrains" Official 2-Disc Soundtrack
- "Journey from Savior to Stranger" Art Book
- Collector's Box

name: Sacred Forest
summary: Embark on an open world adventure in Sacred Forest! Play as a pixel art heroine, master slow-mo archery, glide with your cape, and swing with grapple arrows. Battle blight-infected monsters, undertake epic quests, and restore balance to the forest!

name: Sahara Storms WWIII
summary: Sahara Storms WWIII is a multiplayer tactical First Person Shooter based on modern current environment. Offering objective gameplay where every player plays their part to win. Whether if you are a Assault, a Support, a Medic or Recon Class each role is important.

name: Sacred Curse
summary: After awakening from a deathlike dream, Charlotte's life turned into a terrible tale.

name: Safari Chef
summary:
Join our cooking chef all over the world and feed the animals! Help the chef with cooking food for the animals in this physics based game. Draw a line and drop the food on the right spot so the animals can get their favourite food.
Everyone can enjoy Safari Chef! Kids, adults and the whole family. If you like physics based games, food puzzles or cooking games, this game is for you! Help our chef and feed many animals around the world. Test your brain and help the animals get their favorite food.
Safari Chef is a game in which physics are important. Make sure to drop the food on the right spot! There are 90 different levels and each one of them is a fun puzzle the you’ll have to solve. Download for free one of the best cooking chef games with levels.

name: Samsara Agent
summary: "Samsara Agent"is a dark apocalyptic action Roguelite game. You will play the role of a survivor of the apocalypse, carrying a unique skill and inheriting the power of the Starry Kings, just like opening a system to enter the apocalypse, bringing a glimmer of peace to this apocalypse!

name: Say Goodbye: Deluxe Edition
summary: Deluxe Edition includes: - Short DLC with ending of story - Wallpapers with characters Also: - You will have the game on your account - Trading Cards

name: Sanga
summary: Seek the Sanga!

name: Save the Pirate: Sea Story - Tribal Legacy
summary: An adventure game about a funny pirate and a treasure hunt with logic tasks. The player has two options for the course of events, from which you need to choose the right one, guided by logic.

name: Savior of Light
summary: Get emotionally involved and challenge yourself with this all new Story Rich RPG adventure! Explore the destiny of Hikari Megami, a young woman mysteriously teleported to Enolu, a world that is being consumed by darkness.

name: Sales Pitch
summary: Have you ever stumbled your way through a presentation? Of course you have, and this game is made so you can relive that experience with these two lovely ladies who are suddendly doing a sales pitch with no idea about what's going on.

name: Sakura-iro Dreamer
summary: Sakura-iro Dreamer is a short heartwarming coming-of-age visual novel featuring hololive member Sakura Miko.

name: Sapo Xulé: O Mestre do Kung Fu
summary: Sapo Xulé: O Mestre do Kung Fu is an official port of Kung Fu Kid made by Tectoy and released in Brazil in 1995.

name: Sabotaj
summary: Sabotaj an MMOFPS game being developed in Turkey. A 9v9 team-based game, the maps are based on Turkish locales such as the Basilica Cistern, Cappadocia, and an ancient Istanbul site. Sabotaj has a in-game real time economy.

name: Samba de Amigo: Party Central - All in Pack
Salto
summary: The best adventures happen as you dream: Jump from between high ledges and buildings to explore the world above the clouds! Single and Two-player local Coop.

name: Saint Warner's Angels
summary: Howdy partner, welcome to Warner's Pass! In this Western turn-based RPG, get ready to fight unseen creatures, high school drama queens, and a shady underground criminal society, accompanied by stunning, hand drawn battle sequences that offer you plenty of choices to approach battles in your own way!

name: Sailor Fuku Bishoujo Zukan Vol. 3
summary: A pornographic action game.

name: Saimin Reiki
summary: A visual novel from Clock Up.

name: Sakura no Sora to, Kimi no Koto: Sweet Petals For My Dear
summary: It has been said that wishes will come true when the sky is full of cherry blossom petals. However, the number of sakura trees have dwindled due to recent re-development and one can no longer see such a sight. Ryou is the son of a famous artist and much was expected of him, but he decides to live a life of a commoner with few friends. One spring day, his childhood friend Kanata suddenly fainted and was hospitalized. Since that day, his days began to gradually change.

name: Sandiego Inc.
summary: Sandiego Inc. is an educational geography puzzle video game, inspired by the classic Where in the World Is Carmen Sandiego? Players must use their geographical knowledge to track down a villain who has stolen a priceless artifact and is attempting to escape by flying to different countries worldwide. By deciphering clues left behind, players can predict the villain's next destination and ultimately catch and arrest them. As the game progresses, the clues become increasingly obscure, challenging players' geographical skills even further.

name: Samurai Cats
summary: Samurai Cats is a social game adaptation of the Nobunaga's Ambition series which turns historical figures into cats with kitty themed names. It debuted to the public on the informal Japanese holiday, Cat Day.

name: Saving Synthwave City
summary: A simple arcade-style game about steering a rocket away from buildings to save the city below for as long as possible. Control your missile with your mouse. Fly close to the ground for more points, and pick up bonus stars for a score boost!

name: Samurai Warriors 5: Ikkitousen Box
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Samurai Warriors 5
- Character Artbook
- Original Soundtrack x 2
- Post Card Set
- Cloth Poster
- Mini Acrylic Stand Set

name: Sakura Knight 3
summary: Estelle's adventures in the land of Lemuria come to a head in this yuri fantasy visual novel. Estelle faces a fierce challenge in the form of the wicked dragonkin Saga, all while deciding which member of her party she wants to pledge her to heart to. It's hard to fight evil and fall in love!

name: Salem
summary:
Salem is a fully open sandbox MMO with deep crafting elements. The game features permadeath as one of its main ingredients, along with an in-depth character development system without set roles, where the player can chose which kind of game to play. Taking place in the time of the first Pilgrims, Salem lets you live as an explorer in the new world; building your settlement, learning new skills and maybe fight with your neighbours.

The only place in Salem not built by the players is the main city Providence, which is a safe-zone where one can meet other players, trade, converse and enjoy the social aspects of the game. Outside of Providence only wilderness awaits, and the further you come from civilization the darker and more dangerous the world around you becomes. Until you reach the deep lumberwoods and no longer have to fear Pilgrims but instead witches and hidebehinds...

name: Saturday Night Speedway
summary: Saturday Night Speedway is a video game developed by Ratbag Games and Atari. The video game was first released on March 4, 2004 as a PC game, and was subsequently ported to Sony's PlayStation 2 video game console.

name: Santego Special Unit
summary: Santego Special Unit is a mod for Max Payne 2: The Fall Of Max Payne based on Half-Life: Opposing Force.

name: Sands of Sodis
summary: A dark fantasy ATB-combat JRPG, centered on open exploration, deep character interactions, intricate map movement and experimental combat mechanics. A fusion of the classic JRPG with nihilism and psychological, Lovecraftian horror.

name: Santa's Big Adventures
summary:
A good looking santa platformer game made for kids/casual gamers.
Play as Santa and try to collect all lost presents and put them in the chimney.
Avoid fantastic creatures like a living snowman, the reindeer and spikes.
Complete all the levels and save the Christmas.

This game is specially made for kids/casual gamers.

name: Saddle Up and Drive: El Contrabandista
summary: Saddle Up & Drive is a top down car game. Gotta hustle and rustle up some cash. Get involved in shady business with underground stills, land an honest job or race in the County Competition! Every day's a fresh start, and a new job awaits ya!

name: Samantha Oups! Le Jeu
summary: A DS party game based on a French sitcom.

name: Sampling
summary: Sneak-Sample-Morph-Fight-Hinder-Rescue-Hide-Escape.

name: Sans Logique
summary: Sans Logique is a first-person game that blends puzzle and adventure gameplay. You'll explore different dreamlike worlds, discover the story of your character, and solve some original puzzles.

name: Sakura In Gameland
summary: Sakura has been teleported to GameLand by it's helpless residents to battle the threat of the invading Wizard of Woe and his collection of malevolent monsters. In this 2D platformer help Sakura blast her way through multiple levels across eight areas of GameLand, overcoming the many obstacles put in her way. Can you reach the castle of the vile Wizard and free GameLand from his evil clutches before it's to late!

name: Sailist
summary: Upgrade your ship and expand your fleet in a thrilling adventure on the infinite seas! Take a relaxing voyage and enjoy the scenery while listening to the soothing sounds of the ocean, or diligently search for other ships to plunder. Live the life of a sailor on the free seas.

name: Sango Guardian Chaos Generation Steamedition
summary: Sango Guardian Chaos Generation Steamedition is a fighting game,Most of the characters and scenes are designed with Chinese elements,Random selection of 9 scenes,Rich comboes challenge you.Fight with your friends!

name: Saeko-san to Issho!
summary: Fandisc of "Natsuiro ☆ Communication ♪" that contains a mini-scenario devoted to Rindou Saeko heroine.

name: Saint Seiya Omega: Ultimate Cosmo
summary: Saint Seiya Omega: Ultimate Cosmo is an Action game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2012.

name: Samurai Wars
summary: Immerse yourself in the wonderful world of 12th-century Japan. Become a samurai. At your disposal is only the sword, so TAKE THE FIGHT!

name: Sacred Earth: Promise
summary: Sacred Earth: Promise is a four- to six-hour visual novel/RPG experience set within a fantasy world of floating continents and ancient ruins, with a dynamic custom battle system and a compelling cast of characters.

name: Saints Row IV: How the Saints Save Christmas
summary: How the Saints Save Christmas is the second mission pack for Saints Row IV, and has 3 missions. It is also part of the Season Pass bundle, and the National Treasure Edition. It was released on the 10th December, one day prior to its announced release date.

name: Saint Patrick's Day Break Head to Head
summary: Saint Patrick’s Day Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated bricks tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Sandra Fleming Chronicles: Crystal Skulls
summary: Do the Crystal Skulls truly possess mystical powers, or is their magic nothing more than a myth? Join Sandra Fleming on her danger-filled journey to find the legendary artifacts!

name: Samozbor ID:Heaven
summary: Breach enemy stronghold in dread Siberian wastelands before insurgents can open gates to Samozbor dimension.

name: Sandpit
summary: Sandpit is a sandbox mod for Half-Life.

name: Sales Employee Takeru-Kun
summary: Hello World!! This game is based on the image of a Japanese arcade game from the 70's to early 80's where you could easily play by inserting 1 coin. The player will work hard at his sales job to save L.Planning, a company that has been reincarnated into another world.

name: Save the Penguins - Block Puzzle
summary: Save the Penguins is a touchscreen puzzle game. It is an unique little puzzler, yet easy to learn and play.

name: Safe Robber
summary: A simple sokoban-like puzzle game about robbing houses full of furniture.

name: Sapphic Space
summary: A women-loving-women choices-matter adult visual novel in a sci-fi setting! Experience lesbian love with an android on a spaceship. Play as Miss Puter, the ship computer, and influence the story towards romance with diverse lady characters and multiple endings.

name: Saddle Up: Time to Ride
summary: Horse racing and horse caring game.

name: Sanctumate
summary: A fantasy RPG designed to give you a quick dose of dungeon crawling adventure. Find ancient runes to augment your equipment, allowing you to mix & match magical effects. Delve deep into dungeons, fight demons and monsters, gather loot, and offer sacrifice to your ancestors to increase your strength.

name: Save the Fish!
summary:
Save the Fish is a relaxing pull the pin game with many interesting brain teaser puzzles.

Solve challenging and unique puzzles while decorating your aquariums for your lovely fish. Lead your fish to safety by avoiding lava and poisonous gas and letting the water flow into the fish tank in this fun pin pulling game!

name: Sacrifices
summary: Dive into the 'Sacrifices', a narrative-driven adventure game where you unravel the poignant tale of a child's reality.

name: Sausage Wars: Complete Edition
summary: Complete Edition includes the full game and 3 additional stages: Trapdoor Hell, Laser Massacre and Burning Death.

name: Sable Maze: Twelve Fears - Collector's Edition
summary: Your daughter's lost in the Maze of Fears, but you'll face more than her disappearance if you dare to enter.

name: Santa's Gifts
summary: Ho, ho, ho! It feels better that the winter holidays are approaching. Have you been dutiful this year? Are you ready to help Santa? Clear his way so that he can make all children happy this year too, besides, what else is magic for? It's not so hard, just put your brain on and help Santa! Merry Christmas everyone!

name: Sayfield Defense
summary: A Tower Defense game with an integrated FPS system! Sayfield Defense sets place in a post apocalyptic world! Use towers, tactical powers and more unique mechanics to defend your base from the zombies at all cost!

name: Sacred Gems
summary: Sacred Gems is a 2D exploration bullet hell game with turret building. Ascend the realms of divinity as you grow turret cells to fight off evil energy!

name: Sabak Legend
summary: The annual giant offering, the genuine license, the super-burning mobile game "Sabak Legend" shocked! The game has innovative functions such as strategic combination, warfare and tactics, as well as sacred beasts, BOSS homes, super-explosives, 10,000-person sieges, cross-service expeditions, etc.

name: Samurai Beat
summary: Slice bamboo to the rhythm while dodging projectiles to maintain your flow and pace. Will you conquer the beat and become a true samurai master?

name: Samurai Warrior: The Battles of Usagi Yojimbo
summary:
Samurai Warrior: The Battles of Usagi Yojimbo is a computer game released for the Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum and Amstrad CPC platforms in 1988, by the now-defunct label Firebird. The package artwork comes from the cover of the comic book Anything Goes #6.
It was developed by Beam Software, published by Firebird, and distributed by Thunder Mountain. It is a one-player Beat 'em up game that comes on either a Cassette tape or Floppy disk (depending on the platform), and is played with a joystick.

The game was released in the United States under the title Usagi Yojimbo as part of the Thunder Mountain Action Pack, Vol. 1. It was contained on Disk 1, Side 1 along with the games Great Escape, Paradroid, and (on Side 2) Implosion. The packaging for this version used artwork from the cover of Usagi Yojimbo Volume 1, # 17 along with images from the other games included in the set.

name: Saihate Hospital
summary: A mysterious RPG in which children in "Saihate-cho" fight with each other.

name: Santa Claus: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
summary: A game in the "Breakthrough Gaming Arcade" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Sanctum Arcadia
summary: Sanctum Arcadia is a game where you must fight your way through increasingly dangerous zones filled with enemies, hazards, and mystery. Sanctum Arcadia has a unique but still familiar progression system, challenging and engaging combat, all in a smooth Arcade-like experience.

name: Sacred Cubes
summary: A logic game with many exciting levels of varying difficulty.

name: Santa Punishes
summary: Santa Punishes - 2d platform game, playing as Santa you need to return the holiday to people's houses. Hunt robots and kill them all on the levels. Accumulate sweets and exchange them in the store for different upgrades. Avoid traps and fight the boss.

name: Samurai
summary: Samurai is a tricky and tactical turn-based adventure. Take on the Yokai fortress one area at a time and face increasingly challenging foes in beautiful low-poly Japanese themed environments.

name: Sanonta
summary: Sanonta is a simple memory/clicker game where you unlock funny sayings and proverbs from Finland. May contain: snow, cute animals, a pretty Finnish girl and sisu.

name: Sanae no Gensoukyou
summary: A doujin game by Aqua Style based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Sakai Burai Kaiji: Death or Survival
summary: Deathly Survival: your main goal is to survive

name: Santo Island Incident
summary: Overgrowth took over the whole Santo Island and facility as a result of an unknown incident. Your mission is to find out the source of the incident and solve what's happened at Santo Island.

name: Saki: Achiga-Hen Episode of Side-A Portable
Sakura Taisen Steam Radio Show
summary: The second Sakura Taisen fan disc that contains several short scenarios, music from the stage plays, and a preview for the upcoming sequel.

name: Sapu
summary: Sapu is a young frog who lives in the frog village located in the frog forest. On a beautiful Tuesday afternoon Sapu is awakened by other villagers, informing him that his grandfather had been bitten by a poisonous carnivorous plant while catching fireflies for dinner, and that he was on the brink of death. Sapu despairs but soon has an idea of how to save his grandfather and goes on an adventure in the forest.

name: Sankyo Fever! Fever!
summary: Sankyo Fever! Fever! is a Miscellaneous game, published by Nippon Telenet, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Save the Planet
summary: Naturally, your number one task is to kill the monsters! Just don’t let them cross the red line on the right. Track your progress as you go and Save the Planet in 60 match3 levels with escalating complexity!

name: Save Me, Sakuya-san!
summary: She's here to help! Let Sakuya Izayoi from the Touhou Project comfort you after encountering some hardships in this beautiful visual novel that aims to heal your troubles away!

name: Samurai of the Lanterns
summary: Guide the Lantern Keeper through the malignant forest in this action-packed rouge-lite with Samurai-style fighting, fast-paced combats, chaotic boss encounters and unforgiving difficulty.

name: Sage Mountain
summary: You who used to work as a developer in a city. The longing for your hometown has grown so great that you come back to your hometown. When you opened your eyes to the mysterious light of the shrine, you realized that 575 years ago you came back.

name: Saga of Weil
summary: Saga of Weil is an old school side scrolling adventure with some souls-like style combat

name: Saving Punyville
summary: Saving Punyville is an indie dungeon crawler RPG. Fight monsters and bosses in a classic 2D top down shooter style. Explore dungeons and caves to find treasures and rescue your townspeople.

name: Sandy Path
summary: Sandy Path - a game in which you need to help the fox to get home.

name: Sammy's Science House
summary: An educational game created by the Edmark Corporation targeted at younger audiences.

name: SAS: Zombie Assault 3
summary: SAS: Zombie Assault 3 is an online game that runs directly from the browser in which the player's objective is to survive the infestation of murderous zombies. In it, you must join forces with other players around the world to increase your chances of succeeding during missions.

name: Sacred

name: Safety: Life Is A Maze

name: Sailor Moon RevengeX

Queen Metalia is planning to control planet Earth, and Sailor Moon must prevent it to save all forms of life, accompany Serena in this amazing battle.

Detailed and musicalized in the Sailor Moon cartoon, a video game that every true anime and PS2 fans can't help but enjoy.

name: Sanrio Cup: Pon-pon Volley

The plot follows a "Clan [B0S] fighter" as he wakes up from a nightmare into an apocalypse already in-progress. It is then gradually revealed that "the worthy" have already ascended to heaven, while everyone else have turned into bloodthirsty demons who are left to infight. He journeys into a now-desolate world, searching for answers as to what had happen, and why only he retained his humanity.

Those who teased me are all in their graves now!

You can earn money by performing routine mission in the game, and the "non-stop" where you gain bonuses for the damages caused to other road users. name: Sargon II
summary:
Origin
The original SARGON was written by Dan and Kathleen 'Kathe' Spracklen in a Z80-based computer called Wavemate Jupiter III[1] using assembly language through TDL Macro Assembler.

The name was originally written entirely in capitals because early computer operating systems such as CP/M did not support lower-case file names.

Introduction
SARGON was introduced at the 1978 West Coast Computer Faire where it won the first computer chess tournament held strictly for microcomputers, with a score of 5-0.[2][3] This success encouraged the authors to seek financial income by selling the program directly to customers. Since magnetic media were not widely available at the time, the authors placed an advert in Byte Magazine and mailed $15 photocopied listings that would work in any Z80-based microcomputer.[1] Availability of the source code allowed porting to other machines. For example, the March–April 1979 issue of Recreational Computing describes a project that converted Sargon to an 8080 program by using macros. Later the Spracklens were contacted by Hayden Books and a book was published.[4]

Commercialization through electronic media
When magnetic media publishing became widely available, a Navy Petty Officer, Paul Lohnes, ported Sargon to the TRS-80, altering both graphics, input, and housekeeping routines leaving the Spracklen's chess-playing algorithm intact. Paul consulted with the Spracklens, both living in San Diego at the time, to make the TRS-80 version an instant success with the help of Hayden Book's newly established software division: Hayden Software. Paul was not involved in further refinements to the TRS-80 version due to his reassignment to sea duty shortly after signing the deal with Hayden Software. In the early 1980s SARGON CHESS was ported to several earlier microcomputers, i.e. NASCOM (by Bits & PCs, 1981), Exidy Sorcerer, Sharp MZ 80K,[5] and many others. A complete rewrite was necessary later for the Apple II port, made by Kathleen's brother Gary Shannon. Both were published by Hayden Software.

Sequels
The Spracklens made significant improvements on the original program[1] and released Sargon II. In 1978 it tied for third at the ninth North American Computer Chess Championship despite being seeded ninth of 12 entries. Sargon finished only behind Belle and Chess 4.7, and defeated AWIT—running on a $5 million Amdahl mainframe—amazing the audience.[6][3][1] That year they published a series of articles in BYTE on computer chess programming,[2][7] stating "we think it would be nice if not everyone had to reinvent the wheel".[6]

Sargon II was ported to a variety of personal computers popular in the early 1980s.[8] The game engine featured multiple levels of lookahead to make it more accessible to beginning chess players. BYTE in 1980 estimated that Sargon II had a 1500 rating at the highest tournament-time difficulty level, and speculated that it was the best chess program on sale, including dedicated devices.[9]

Sargon 2.5, sold as a ROM module for the Chafitz Modular Game System, was identical to Sargon II but incorporated pondering.[10] It received a 1641 rating at the Paul Masson tournament in June–July 1979, and 1736 at the San Jose City College Open in January 1980.[3]

Sargon 3.0 finished in seventh place at the October 1979 North American Computer Chess Championship. The competition had improved, but 3.0 drew against Cray Blitz and easily defeated Mychess, its main microcomputer rival. In December 3.0 easily won the second microcomputer championship in London.[3]

In 1980, the Spracklens' Reversi game finished in first place at a computer tournament at Northwestern University, and in 1981 it finished in third place at the Santa Cruz Open Othello Tournament.[11]

Sargon III was a complete rewrite from scratch. Instead of an exchange evaluator, this version used a capture search algorithm. Also included was a chess opening repertoire. This third version was written originally for the 6502 assembler and was commercially published by Hayden Software in 1983. Apple contacted the Spracklens and, after a port for 68000 assembly, Sargon III was the first third-party executable software for the Macintosh.[1]

After the demise of Hayden Software, later chess programs were also released under the name Sargon, including Sargon IV (Spinnaker Software), Sargon V (Activision) and a CD-i title simply named Sargon Chess. The Spracklens concurrently wrote the engines for the dedicated chess computers produced by Fidelity Electronics, which won the first four World Microcomputer Chess Championships.

It does not matter if you are a novice or adept sailor, participate in thrilling regattas and fast paced races against computer-controlled opponents, compete online with players from all over the world, upgrade and unlock new boats, complete amazing and action-filled courses and collect all in-game trophies and gold awards! Become the ultimate master of Sailboat Championship - the only true and addicting sailing simulation with unique gameplay for your device.

Your task is to draw an icy road that will help Santa Claus to collect gifts and bonuses, as well as avoid dangerous traps and obstacles such as birds, snow islands, snowmans, x-mas trees etc.

A mini-game collection in the Sakura Taisen series that is playable online. Also included a series of tabletop games packed in.

The game was released in two versions, Teito no Nagai Hibi and Paris no Yuugana Hibi.

name: Sangokushi for WonderSwan

summary: The rules are simple. Just cut the food.

Players assume the role of Agent Cain, a powerful Psionic working for an elite government agency. As Cain, you strive for mastery of innate psychic “Talents” such as the ability to shoot fireballs or the power to summon hideous creatures. Using these “Talents” depletes both Health and Sanity, so players must walk a fine line to ensure that they don't lose their minds!

name: Savage 2: A Tortured Soul
summary:
Building upon the story from the original, Savage 2: A Tortured Soul relies heavily on multiplayer action with only a single-player tutorial and practice mode for solo play. Each side in a single game is allowed up to 62 players, and gamers select a commander, game parameters, wait for a minimum amount of players, designate officers, set up battle squads, and then begin the game.

Features

•Play as the Legion of Man or the Beast Horde, and unlock the Hellbourne, a race that is playable by both factions
•Includes a single-player "Tutorial," and "Practice" mode, and a large multiplayer "Conquest" option
•Get together with 62 conquest-loving gamers and battle online for resources, gold, and power

name: Sawdust
summary: Sand saw and nail your way through this chaotic couch co-op game for one to four players. Gather your finely-grained team of carpenters and carve out your oak-shaped fortune. Make sure you keep up your production line to keep every customer satisfied.

name: Sandtable Engine
summary: Welcome to the sandbox world full of creativity! With a free and open gameplay mode and a creative platform, whether you are a player or a developer, you can find highly scalable gameplay and game modes, or DIY your own game ideas here!

name: Sand Story
summary: It's a hot vacation time. Surrounded by an atmosphere of freedom, away from everyday worries, spending free minutes under the starry sky on the seashore, the feelings flare up so often, starting a bright sense of falling in love, which turns into a summer love.

name: Saving Mr. Sparkles
summary:
Saving Mr. Sparkles is a challenging 2D platformer. The main character's cat (Mr. Sparkles) runs away from home, and she must chase after him.

It has short but difficult levels, where the player has to use his/her momentum to make it to the end.

name: Sailing Wizard
summary: This is a real-time ARPG game with the theme of navigation. You can freely choose spells upgrade routes, recruit various team members, build exclusive ships. Trade, fight and explore with different factions on a journey full of adventurous spirit.

name: Sable Maze: Nightmare Shadows - Collector's Edition
Sable Maze: Sinister Knowledge - Collector’s Edition
Samurai VR

name: Sanctum
summary:
The world of H.P. Lovecraft is full of dark places and mystical creatures that you should stay away from. You received a letter from your close friend Anna, a detective conducting an investigation of mysterious disappearances in the nearby forests. Now you have no other choice but to do everything to save her. In the letter she asked for your help and then you never heard back from her again...

You are about to conduct your own investigation. It is time to visit an old abandoned monastery, where the cult of an ancient deity settled. You will have to risk not only your life but also your soul when you encounter the mysterious force that slumbers in the dungeon of the empty monastery. In order to find out what happened to your friend and get away from paranormal phenomena you will have to face horrifying secrets this dark sanctuary hides and solve ancient puzzles.

name: Savage Skies
summary: Savage Skies is an Action game, developed by iRock Interactive and published by Big Ben Interactive, which was released in Europe in 2002.

name: Samurai

name: Salt Lake 2002

Compete against the world's best athletes in 6 Olympic events in 4 different play modes - Alpine Skiing Downhill, Two-man Bobsleigh, Ski Jumping K120 Individual, Snowboard Parallel Giant Slalom, and more. name: Sarakon
summary:
A simple variation of the classic game of Mahjongg Solitaire (also known as Shanghai). Each of the 40 levels consist of rows and piles of tiles, patterned with symbols such as butterflies and masks. Pair them up within the time limit to move on a level. The difficulty is that a tile can only be moved if it has no tile on top of it, and a gap either to the left or right (or both). Careful planning ahead is required if all tiles are to be cleared. 
 
A gameboy version was developed and completed, but never released officially.

name: Sands of Salzaar: The Ember Saga
summary: This DLC contains 3 content expansions: "Ember Workshop", "Child Rearing" and "Among Legends: Xin Qi Ji", and they can be independently loaded/removed in the game.

name: Sakura Shadow Monsters
summary: Challenging platform game where you control Sakura, a character with a different personality. Your mission is to rescue your girlfriend who is in the middle of a zombie apocalypse (or not) and leave the island.

name: Savanna Shot VR
summary:
You are a savanna's National Park Ranger!
With nature-rich savannah, you must drive a 4WD off-road car and use an anesthetic gun to manage the ecology of animals!

name: Sandhill Architectures
summary: Work as a programmer for Sandhill Architectures in the year 1973. Design and optimize programs using Sandhill Architectures' newest and most powerful computer, the Sandhill III.

name: Save All Monsters!
summary: Puzzle game where you place all the monsters in safe squares before the time ends! Analyze the chess-like attack patterns of weapons to avoid danger. Use resistant monsters to protect normal monsters from ranged attacks! Keep social distancing with bomb monsters! Discover and save all the monsters!

name: Samorost 3: Cosmic Edition
summary: Samorost 3 follows a curious space gnome who uses the powers of a magic flute to travel across the cosmos in search of its mysterious origins. Visit nine unique and alien worlds teeming with colorful challenges, creatures and surprises to discover, brought to life with beautiful artwork, sound and music.

name: Sabbuth
summary: You've waken up in a strange place not knowing who you are or what your purpose is. A being lays before you emerging from the ground. He offers you an escape, something you can't refuse. Traverse 3 different areas collecting Artifacts to return to this being while avoiding evil forces.

name: Safe Harbor
summary: Lost at sea, find your way back to Safe Harbor.

name: Samsara
summary: Enter a world thrown out of balance. Nature has separated into its three physical states with no hope of returning to harmony. It's up to you to restore the balance. Use your abilities over solid, liquid, and gas to traverse levels and solve puzzles in this 2D platformer.

name: Santa's Giftship Reloaded
summary:
Help Santa and the elves save Christmas!!
The first sign of trouble arose when Krampus thought he could do a better job than good ole St. Nick and things steadily got worse from there. Now a third of the North Pole has turned into angry, envious elves deceived by Krampus, Santa’s evil twin. They are attempting to shut down Christmas! Early reports are coming in of elf operatives aligning with dissenters nearing Santa's workshop. Reinforcements are headed to the scene as well but will it be soon enough? Will the children be left with nothing but coal?! It is up to you to help Santa save Christmas. Elf Suit up! Don’t let these evil forces choose a counterfeit and prevail with their cries.
The critics of the controversial Frostmaster BL19 Sleigh will be eating crow tomorrow...

name: Sanator: Scarlet Scarf
summary: Scarlet Scarf is a visual novel inspired by the legend of Plague Maiden. Dive into the dark mysteries of a dying city with the fate of Sanator Richard Murdock in your hands. Perhaps it's not too late to stop the on-going calamity...

name: Sand: An Adventure Story
summary:
It’s the 1920s. Leo Parker, renowned archaeologist and explorer, is in Giza working on an excavation for the British crown. Soon to head home, Leo gets wind of the discovery of a new tomb. His exploration of this tomb begins an adventure that will lead him to discover not just about the ancient past, but about himself as well.
Sand is part puzzle game, part adventure, part graphic novel. Unravel the story of the long-dead Pharaoh Anat as you solve puzzles and discover clues across a variety of Egypt-themed settings. Delve tombs, trace clues in the stars themselves, haggle with merchants, unlock ancient doors and journey back to ancient Egypt itself in search of answers.

name: Santa Tracker
summary: Track Santa's flight and play games in your browser and on Android.

name: Satellites
summary: Satellites is an XNA community game available over Xbox Live Marketplace. It is a puzzle game

name: Sackgasse: The Last Resort
summary: In a post-apocaliptic world, be the ultimate savior with only your gun and guts. Are you trustible enough to defend your Resort? If so, help Aya surviving hordes of enemies while uncover the truth, in this Survival Shooter Tower Defense Game! Things will gonna be wild... literally!

name: Saint Maribel
summary: Saint Maribel is a metroidvania-action game with RPG elements. Marical goes to fight the queen of Succubus.

name: SantaCorps: Snow Patrol
summary: Don the parka and shovel of the SantaCorps' Snow Patrol elf unit in this accessible arcade puzzle frenzy!

name: Save King
summary: Carefully adjust the force so that the princess does not fall down from the maze to reach the 11th floor. Traps installed throughout the maze interfere with the princess, so it is easy to go to the beginning floor if you do something wrong.

name: Safe Not Safe
summary: Safe Not Safe is a rogue-lite infiltration sim. Infiltrate huge levels. Find and loot the safe. Get out alive.

name: Safe Place for Dust
summary: About having a calm space for yourself.

name: Saikyo Ginsei Shogi Go: New Standard
summary: New Standard fifth Edition of Ginsei Shogi

name: Sanctum: Map Pack 1
summary: This DLC adds four additional maps for Sanctum. The maps included are: Aftermath, Aftershock, Cavern and Slums.

name: Sanrio World: Kero Kero Keroppi no Bouken Nikki
summary: Kero Kero Keroppi no Bouken Nikki is a Role-Playing game, published by Character Soft, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Save the Unicorn
summary: Is a sidescroller game in which you need to fly a helicopter piloted by a cute panda, and save falling unicorns from evil opponents

name: Saiyuki: Journey West
summary: A Journey of Friendship...A Journey fraught with Danger...A Journey to Save the World...A Journey West. Based on one of the most popular legends of China, Saiyuki takes you on an epic journey from China to India and back. Recruit the Monkey King, Son Goku, and others like them to defeat untold monsters along the way.

name: Satisfactory: Update 2
summary: The update that brings you all the Tier 7 content and Trains! Get ready to build even bigger factories with 11 new parts, some of them among the most complex in the game so far, and haul large amounts of resources across the entire map via train cargo.

name: Satisfactory: Update 7
summary:
Blueprints
The Blueprint Designer
In this brand-new building you will be able to design, adjust, and save Blueprints for use in your factory. Anything that fits inside the confines of the Designer (4 by 4 Foundations and 8 Walls in height) you will be able to build with a single click as a Blueprint.

Building Blueprints
Any Blueprint you save in the designer is added to the Blueprints Build Menu Tab, which you can organise as you see fit. From there you can select it like any other building or add it to your Hotbar. Blueprints have some unique build modes of their own, one focused on detailed control and the other on snapping with other Blueprints.

Creature Game Modes
Passive and Retaliating
These are the two new modes we added for Creature hostility which allow you to adjust how to interact with the combat aspect of Satisfactory. If you do want to fight, but want more control over the when and how, the Retaliating mode is for you. Creatures will only attack you if you attack them first, and this works per single creature. So, if you want to fight a group of Hogs or other creatures one after the other, you can do that now.

Passive mode is exactly what it says: All creatures will remain passive, no matter if you attack them or not. If you want to enjoy Satisfactory without the action aspects, Passive mode gets the job done.

You can set your preferred Creature hostility in the Escape Menu under ‘Advanced Gameplay Settings’.

In the future
This is mostly what we have in mind for allowing you to customise your experience with Creatures. In the future we are planning to implement more game modes that allow you to adjust how you play Satisfactory. But that is for after Update 7.

name: Satisfactory: Update 4
summary:
Update 4 is finally available on Early Access! This update is jam-packed with new content! New Nuclear Refinement and waste recycling, new top tier buildings, lights - together with the new changes to power this update is fully charged.
There are improvements to networking, optimisations, UI, quality of life, all the good stuff.

name: Satisfactory: Update 3
summary:
As much as we liked to pretend pipes were useless, Satisfactory was not going to be complete without them. So here they are!

Transporting fluids will be a different challenge than transporting your regular solid resources. While the conveyor belts move at static speeds, fluid flow in pipes will fluctuate based on input amounts, and head lift when you need to push them upwards.

name: Satisfactory: Update 8
summary: New Power Tower & Priority Power Switch buildings, new advanced game settings, improvements to blueprints, biomes and more.

name: Salvation of the soul
summary: Salvation of the soul is a first person game. You need to perform a ritual to save the soul of the girl, while not being killed.

name: Saint Sword
summary: You are Macress, a mythical warrior, and you have been called upon to destroy the evil demon, Gorgon before the world succumbs to his power. This is a platform style, hack 'n slash action game where you gain powerups by destroying wee mythical beasties. About:

Savage Bliss is one of the the biggest pc rpgs to date, offering hundreds of hours of gameplay and is considered a genre defining example. Experience the Legend!
over 100 side quests, over 75 dungeons and caves to explore. 20 villages, towns, and cities to find out many story's and quests.
With over 500 npc's you will find Savage Bliss to be a living breathing world.
Tons of random loot alot was put into the loot system with over 1000 items, weapons, and armor. 75 spells split into domains.

World:
The world in Savage Bliss is huge, and most of it is open world and nonlinear. you are welcome to come and go as you please,
Just becarful not to venture into the unknown!

Sasa, is an arcade video game released for the MSX1 in 1984 and later for the Family Computer titled as Astro Robo SASA in 1985.

This video game involved obtaining capsules with an 'E' on them, sometimes suspended by balloons. The main character could only use bullets to propel himself, and when the bullet count reaches 0, the game ends. A player can also lose bullets by colliding with an enemy, the other player, or the other player's bullets.

Featuring immersive sounds and atmospheric scenes, Nitori will give you insight on some of the most relevant topics in life, not bad for a pack of cucumbers, right?

name: Savage XR
summary:
Be a Commander or a Warror - RTS meets FPS 
 
Savage: The Battle for Newerth is a science fiction game released by S2 Games on September 9th, 2003. It was a first of its kind; described by S2 as a real-time-strategy-shooter (RTSS). It brought together real-time strategy, first-person shooting, and third-person melee action into one cohesive experience. Set in a distant future when mankind has rebuilt society following an apocalypse, but is threatened by intelligent beasts, players must choose a side, elect their commander (RTS), and go to war (FPS). In 2006 Savage became freeware and its source code was made available to the public. One year later, a handful of dedicated players and modders began work on Savage XR, a project intended to update and overhaul the original game. Now after seven years of development Savage XR is finished and available for free to the public. 
 
XR breathes new life into a game that has held its own for a decade. New features include: in game tutorials, duel practice mode against Python based AI-bots and game-play demos, 500 new props, wide screen support and alternative FOVs, triggers and particle effects, improved models and textures, physics engine supporting realistic collisions, unique items for all competitive clans, a simpler user-friendly installer and automatic game updater, and more. Savage XR is awesome and free!

name: Sanada Juu Yuushi
summary:
An RPG published by Kemco for the Famicom. It was never released outside of Japan.

Sanada Juu Yuushi (roughly "Sanada Ten Braves") is a Sengoku era themed RPG featuring ninjas. The Sanada in question is Yukimura Sanada, the second son of one of the more important daimyos (feudal lords) of that era, who is purported to have had ten legendary ninjas helping his war efforts - the same ten braves referred to by the game's title.

The game's general plot has Sanada finding and recruiting the titular ten braves, usually with the caveat that the player helps them with a task before they'll agree to join the party. The menu-driven RPG battles are a little unusual as each is a one-on-one battle with a singular opponent - however, the player is free to choose from any of the characters they've already recruited, changing the character in the subsequent round if they so wish.

summary: "Zee is lost in Samsara, a puzzling journey of beauty and confusion. Using mystical blocks and powerful portals you must help Zee awaken from Samsara.”

name: Sanatory Hallways
summary: Sanatory Hallways is a two player game, in which one character is Charla, a young student who is experiencing nightmares.

name: Saibara Rieko no Mahjong Hourouki
summary: Saibara Rieko no Mahjong Hourouki is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Natsume and published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Sakigake!! Otokojuku: Nihon yo, Kore ga Otoko de Aru!
summary: Sakigake!! Otokojuku is PS3 game based on manga series written and illustrated by Akira Miyashita. It was originally serialized at the Weekly Shōnen Jump from 1985 to 1991. It is staged in a private boys' school that teaches ōendan to troubled teenagers. The students are trained to "revive the Spirit of Japan" and mainly engage in fighting courses.

name: Salvage Crew
summary: System recovery enabled.

name: Sakura Taisen GB2
summary: The 2nd Game Boy Color Sakura Taisen game.

name: Santa Fe Mysteries: The Elk Moon Murder
summary: Santa Fe Mysteries: The Elk Moon Murder is a video game, the first in the Santa Fe Mysteries series, followed by Santa Fe Mysteries: Sacred Ground. In The Elk Moon Murder, a famous Native American artist named Anna Elk Moon is murdered in the American Southwest.

name: Samurai Sword Stage
summary: Samurai Sword Stage is a cool and simple samurai action game. Kill 100 enemies with your stylish swordsmanship.

name: Saga of Lucimia
summary: Saga of Lucimia

name: Sanrio Characters Picross
summary: This is a puzzle game using Sanrio characters.

name: Sassou Shounen Eiyuuden: Coca-Cola Kid
summary:
Coca-Cola kid is a sidescroller starring the Coca-Cola Kid, the Coke mascot in Japan in the 1990's.
Cokey must hit the streets and take on Team Evil who just went and kidnapped his teacher, Ms. Sakurako. Skate through the city and be brave!

name: Sansara Naga
summary:
Sansara Naga is a role-playing video game that was published by Victor Music Entertainment exclusively to Japan for the Family Computer on the 23rd of March, 1990. A fan-translation was finished and released in 2013 on the 28th of December for Sansara Naga by the hacking and translation group Stardust Crusaders.

Sansara Naga is set in the fantasy-filled lands of India during the Vedic age and also mixes elements of Japanese folklore such as the legend of Brahman Umibouzu ("sea bonze"). Many of the NPCs in game will tell you that Cows are sacred animals and a few will mention the Tower of Ṛta Satya. There is a set of armor in the game called Dharma Armor, which will prevent the player from dealing or being dealt damage.

The story revolves around a Boy/Girl that steals a treasured Ostrich egg from the village of Orissa and decides to reflect upon one's actions; aspiring to become a Dragoon to restore their lost honor. The protagonist will set out on an adventure saving lives, performing good deeds, and raising a newly hatched dragon. There are bosses and many NPC street vendors will attempt to scam you with defective items or attempt to mug you. While the main protagonist does not level and their base stats are fixed at 40 STR, 40 DEF—The dragon that you raise does level. More unique game mechanics to this game include the ability to feed dead bodies to your dragon to raise his level, enchanted armors, field map events, hidden landmarks, a few side quests, and mini-games.

Sansara Naga's gameplay and gameplay mechanics are similar to those of Dragon Quest I, Pokémon and Earthbound.

The Silver Mountains are also referred to as Heaven.

name: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise
summary: The first installment of the pachinko series lovingly referred to as "PachiPara", Sanyo Pachinko Paradise is the first game in the longest pachinko gambling series made by Irem, the game features a library, 2 pachinko machines and also a story mode in which the player is a young pachinko gambler that wants to become millionaire playing pachinko machines and impress beautiful girls with his pachinko skills.

name: Save the Pencil
summary:
You are HB; young, sharp and full of lead. A pencil on a mission to join the dots but there’s a rebellion in the stationery cupboard! The paper clips, rulers, erasers and their friends are angry, and they’ll do anything to stop you. Guide HB to safety and collect the bonus stars to unlock more challenging levels!
Each of the 120 levels across 8 different chapters requires skill, logic and speed. Only the most precise tappers will be able to collect three stars on every level!

name: Safe House Simulator
summary: Safe House Simulator is a realistic simulator of building a safe house that protects residents from the dangers of the modern world. Design, build and survive one of the selected apocalypses.

name: SAS: Zombie Assault
summary: The world is being taken over by bloodthirsty zombies. Be brave, hide behind the barricades and face them.

name: Sanic Ball
summary:
Sanicball is a stupid, silly racing game that throws away complex gameplay mechanics, character progression and microtransactions in favor of pure fast.

It features the all the latest* dumb internet memes thrown together in a blender to form a truly europhoic circlejerking experience. This wasn't the original intention but it ended up happening anyway.

*as of 2014

name: Saving Simon
summary: Simon has some family and puberty problems. Talk, listen, and try to help him.

name: Santa Ski vs. Zombies Ski
summary:
Oh my gosh! Rudolph was furious! Christmas gifts fell down the mountain.
That's where the zombies are skiing. Avoid zombies and put them on the sleigh.
Don't relax until the last minute. It can be played very easily, but it is very difficult to reach the final stage!

name: Sandstorm
summary: Defend base and accompany truck to evacuation point. A lot of enemies, upgrades, bonuses and super weapons!

name: Santa Gift Master
summary: Christmas time is so magical... but Santa Claus is in big trouble! All the presents have fallen off the sleigh and now Santa needs to get them to the right places.

name: Sapphire City Part 2
summary: After a narrow escape you find yourself in an unexplored part of the city with fresh opportunities and new enemies. Face off against corrupt officials, law enforcers and merciless gangs as you delve back into the shadows.

name: Sagger
summary: This is a free part of the Sagger game - historical simulator that will give you control over all Israel resources to face the Yom Kippur War. With the help of your advisor and knowledge, you will acquire, make the crucial decisions that will lead the state of Israel to Victory or Defeat.

name: Saban's Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Mega Battle
summary: The original Power Rangers return in a 2D brawler for PC, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One.

name: Sangoku Ziangqi
summary: A strategy board game set in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms. Combine various soldiers with generals and command your troops to aim for victory!

name: Satella-Q: Nouryou! Natsumatsuri!
summary: A single-episode season of Satella-Q.

name: Sangokushi 12
summary: Sangokushi 12 is a Strategy game, developed and published by Koei Tecmo Games, which was released in Japan in 2012.

name: Samosbor
summary: The player will take the role of a liquidator destroying the consequences of Samosbor in the narrow corridors of Gigakhrushchevka.

name: Sangokushi: Chuugen no Hasha
summary: A war strategy game that focuses on the Ancient Chinese Three Kingdoms conflict. It was developed by TOSE and published by Namco for the NES.

name: SameShadow: Fernando's Journey
summary: "SameShadow: Fernando's Journey" is a third-person ARPG that immerses you in a fallen Ukrainian city. Explore the dark mystery that will reshape the world as you "awaken" extraordinary powers of time, matter, and space within you.

name: Samurai of Hyuga
summary: Samurai of Hyuga is a brutal, heart-pounding interactive tale. Prepare to enter the land of silk and steel, where fantasy clashes against grim reality, and where the good guys don't always win in the end. It's a harsh world with tough choices at every turn. Good thing you're the toughest ronin around.

name: Sacred 3 - Orcland Story
summary: Gragon has taken the Orc Throne, corrupted Orcland and turned its Orcs into Grimmocs. Fight your way through the homeland of the Grimmocs and defeat the wrongful king Gragon. This pack contains 4 all-new missions set in the canyons of Orcland.

name: Sachi's Quest
summary: The war between Humanity and Samarian Empire has been long running, but Sachi as part of the human resistance discovers an end game weapon the Samarians have developed and must stop it.

name: Santatlantean
summary:
Jealous of all the time her husband spends drinking sherry and eating biscuits in other people's houses, Mrs Claus decides the only way to be rid of her overweight husband is to put an evil spell on the Christmas decorations and let them do the dirty work for her. As Santa, you must destroy these festive fiends, but beware; evil baubles are lying in wait, candy canes attack without warning and scented candles are out to burn your beard off!

Santatlantean is a festive high-score action shoot 'em up (based on Aetherbyte's Atlantean) which is free to download and play on a PC Engine emulator of your choice (such as Magic Engine, Mednafen or Ootake) or flash card.

name: Saints of Virtue
summary: Christian themed first-person shooter where you battle giant floating heads repenting Pride, Fear, Vanity and Self-righteousness.

name: Save Your Mother
summary: Alice Andersson, a world-renowned scholar, faces a dilemma of grand proportions when her mother falls gravely ill. No traditional cures have been able to save her; not even the most unconventional methods have worked! Join her as she discovers the legend about the Elohim Cube, a mystical artifact that might be their only hope. Long lost to the sands of time, the Cube is said to possess incredible healing powers. Over the ages, many have attempted to retrieve the cube, but to no avail. All were foiled by the long and arduous path that leads to the cube, and in turn, salvation. Will you be able to unravel the mysteries of the Elohim Cube?

name: San-nin Mahjong
summary: A three player mahjong game for the Othello Multivision/Sega SG-1000.

name: Samsara Room
summary: Samsara Room is the first game created by Studio Maarten, which would later become known as Rusty Lake. It is the precursor for the Cube Escape series, and contains similar puzzles that have been carried into the Rusty Lake games.

name: Sangi
summary: A fast paced and combat oriented 2D platformer. Use multiple weapons and create multiple elemental reactions to efficiently eliminate your enemies. Experience a short story about your origins and try getting the best score possible in the arcade mode.

name: Saturn Menace
summary: It's 2320 AC your scientific exploration module has been damage by a meteor on the Saturn orbit near an old abandoned spacecraft. Must find new energy sources explore space and search a replacement for the core of your spaceship. Enjoy this singleplayer offline 80's 90's inspired sci fi movie game

name: Save Christmas With Santa
summary: SAVE CHRISTMAS WITH SANTA!

name: Samurai Warriors 3 Z
summary: Samurai Warriors 3 Z is a remastered compilation of Samurai Warriors and it's standalone expansion Samurai Warriors 3: Xtreme Legends ported to PlayStation 3 from Wii.

name: Sabrina, the Teenage Witch: Spellbound
summary: Based on the popular TV show Sabrina, The Teenage Witch: Spellbound sets out a goal for the player to become a full-fledged, licensed witch. The player begins the game with a witchcraft learner's permit and must successfully complete 7 spells in order to graduate to the next level.

name: Saviors
summary: Saviors brings the best bullet hell experience you can find on Steam. Play through 18 challenging stages in this ultimate test of tactics and reflexes.

name: SailSim
summary: This sailing simulator applies actual physics to simulate the behavior of a sailing vessel. This means you can actually capsize or sink a vessel if you are not careful. In some cases the simulator can even reproduce unpredictable results based on your actions, selected parameters and conditions.

name: Sakura Taisen Hanagumi Tsuushin
summary: A fan disc that provides interactive news about the future of the Sakura Taisen series as well as quizzes and short video greetings from the characters' voice actresses.

name: Sapper Simulator
summary: Become the sapper in a city haunted by war. Everything can turn out to be a deadly trap. You think you’ve seen it all? Sapper Simmulator brings you to Aleppo, where every day is another fight for survival. One bad move and you can lose it all. Are you ready to face the challenge?

name: Sausage Fiesta
summary: Sausage Fiesta is a multiplayer party game for up to 4 players. Play as a sausage, compete with your friends and discover all the sausages from all over Europe!

name: Save The Doge 2
summary: New puppy rescue mission from the evil bees!

name: Safari Chess
summary:
Play the multiplayer mode online with friends or try the single player mode to challenge and ultimately defeat the Dragon Master.
Smooth and appealing graphics, animation suitable for all age groups.

name: Samurai Solitaire: Threads of Fate
summary: 200 fantastic levels of varying difficulty! Unique solitaire inspired by Japanese culture! Help Ronin find his purpose!

name: Savage
summary: This is an adventure game in the wild.

name: San Andreas Multiplayer
summary: SA-MP is a free Massively Multiplayer Online game mod for the PC version of Rockstar Games Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

name: Sands of Mars
summary: After Dr. Grady and some other members of the archeologic Explorer II expedition on planet Mars went missing, it is your task to find them and bring them back home safely. You start your mission by outfitting your space ship with all nessecary supplies. After having blasted off to space you encounter asteroid fields, enemey spacecraft but also friedly space traders. At last, after landing on Mars you find the remnants of the two ancient alien species which once lived on our red neighbour - the insectoid Zanti and the reptilian Meshim.

name: Sarrisa and the Legendary Sword
summary: Sarissa and the Legendary Sword is a Brazilian turn-based RPG, with a simple and beautiful story. In it, you will follow friends, Sarissa, Dandara, Elaine and Patricia, as they go on an adventurous journey, where love and friendship, and a fated destiny will change their lives forever.

name: SafeZoneVR
summary: SafeZoneVR is a VR interactive survival horror game. Players will scavenge the map trying to escape a fallen SafeZone once strong and bustling as the survivors flocked to it.

name: Santa Run
summary:
Santa Run is a free Christmas game that was created in seven days for all Commodore Amiga fans.

Control Santa as you leap from roof to roof and deliver presents down the chimneys.

Santa Run is a score based game, if you reach the end of the street you will have completed the game. A nice greeting awaits at the end of the game.

name: Saitekikai Spy Simulator
summary: In this game, you control a group of industrial spies, such as "head of household" and "drug addict" (to be added in the future), and infiltrate them into facilities that are hostile to your company. The aim of the game is to accomplish the requests without letting the spies get caught by security.

name: Same Break Game
summary:
Operation Deep Sea Creature Capture.
A puzzle game you keep catching the same character next to each other.

name: SA7: Silent Ability Seven
summary: Otome game for the PlayStation Vita.

name: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise 7: Edokko Gen-san
summary: Pachinko Paradise 7 is one of the many titles in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features faithful 3D recreations of two pachinko machines made by Sanyo Bussan: CR Edokko Gen-san L7, CR Edokko Gen-san M6. There are two modes available: Tsūjō (Normal) mode allows the player to modify a wide range of settings for each machine, while Jissen (Battle) mode challenges the player to win as many balls as possible on the default settings with a limited starting pool and time limit. There is also a View mode where the various animations that play on the in-game display can be freely viewed. There is no story mode.

name: Sams
summary: Classic shooter with traveling to various exotic planets.

name: Saints Row: Undercover
summary:
Saints Row: Undercover is cancelled adaptation of the franchise on PSP. It was meant to be a direct port of Saints Row 2, but drifted into being a stand alone title.
Despite the game being quite far in it's development process, the project was cancelled in 2009.
News of Saints Row: Undercover wasn't released to the public until 2016 when some of the development kits were find at developer's Volition's office.

name: Saikko-nee to Death Game
summary: This is a game about sisters who have decided to participate in a death game, and have to collect bills and deposit them into an ATM in order to survive. Explore to achieve your goals while avoiding TVs that will kill you if you see them, dangerous floating objects, and more.

name: Saturnine Chapel
summary: Saturnine Chapel, also known as MNENMA 0 is a single-level PWAD for Doom II that requires a Boom-compatible source port to play. It was designed by Darryl Steffen (dobu gabu maru) and uses the music track "Egypt," by Zachary Stephens (Ribbiks). It received one of the 2017 Cacowards.

name: Sacrifice Dungeon
summary: Sacrifice Dungeon is an FPS that pays homage to the FPS of old. The game is built on Ray Casting technology, simple yet challenging. Fight your way through hordes of monsters while collecting items and increasing your high score. Find the source of evil that is causing great turmoil to the village of Riksbruk!

name: Sabre Ace: Conflict Over Korea
summary: Sabre Ace: Conflict Over Korea is an air and ground-attack combat flight simulation game which takes place in the skies above Korea. The Korean War was fought between the Soviet Union and the United States using North & South Koreans and free world troops, using the country of Korea as a battleground. Choose to be a pilot for the USA in American aircraft, or on the side of the Koreans in Russian planes.

name: Saints Row: The Big Purple Package
summary: The digital Saints Row: The Big Purple Package bundle contains both Saints Row: The Third - The Full Package & Saints Row IV: Re-Elected including additional DLC packs.

name: Saber Fight VR
summary: VR game focused on fighting with laser sword. Slice your opponents to pieces as well as the surrounding. Deflect incoming projectiles and throw your enemies with your powers! Rebuild your destroyed temple and become master again!

name: Saturn Smash
summary: A new game for the NES

name: Santa Claus Junior
summary: Santa Claus Junior is a platform game for the Gameboy Color. It features a little boy called Nick whose job is to find all presents Santa Claus lost when the evil witch caught him. So, he must defeat the witch and free Santa Claus so that Christmas can commence as usually.

name: Santa's Silent Night
summary: Help Santa to save Christmas!

name: Salad Hunt
summary: One of the few games for kids, stressed out parents, and “young at heart” grandparents alike. A family friendly FPS with cartoony weapons and destructible environments. 3D arcade rail shooter action in a simplified mobile format. No guns or zombies here, just tasty characters and kitchen destruction.

name: Saint Seiya: Awakening
summary: Saint Seiya: Awakening is a mobile game masterpiece which perfectly restores the classic feeling of the Japanese comics. 12 Golden Saints and all classic characters are back to the Sanctuary and waiting for your summoning. Set up your exclusive team and work on your strategy to win! In addition to beautiful game graphics and cool combat effects, you can enjoy Japanese voice acting along with the classic theme songs.

name: Santa's Letters VR
summary: Santa's Letters is a spatial puzzle game in which you have to find matching pieces among a lot of other interesting things. Put them together to make a toy!

name: Samurai Shodown: Kazuki Kazama
summary: This digital purchase will unlock the DLC character "KAZUKI KAZAMA" for your copy of SAMURAI SHODOWN.

name: Santa Challenge
summary:
Welcome to the magical period of Christmas where Santa will brings you on an adventure to verify if everything is ready in the human world for the festivities that will arrive the 24th! 
 
Join Santa on his tour to check that Christmas is well prepared! Complete 30 HD jigsaw puzzles about Winter/ Christmas and Festivities.

name: San Francisco Rush: The Rock Alcatraz Edition
summary: San Francisco Rush: The Rock takes all the great excitement of the original game, San Francisco Rush, but with the addition of special Alcatraz stages!

name: Sangokushi Eiketsuden
summary:
"Sangokushi Eiketsuden" was released in 1995.
This game is a simulation RPG in which players become Liu Bei and battle for the restoration of the Han Imperial court. The game progresses around the battle map. Players fulfill the victory conditions of each battle as they go from battlefield to battlefield to advance the story.

name: Sanctum: Map Pack 2
summary: This map pack adds three action packed levels to your game!ChasmThe Chasm was going to be a hub of transport and mining operations. The plan was to create thousands of new jobs and strengthen the living standards of the people of Elysion One. The Chasm was a good sign of a great future for humanity but nowadays it's abandoned.

name: Savage Hunt: Dragon's Prophet
summary: Change is needed sometimes. After an awesome time with Dragon’s Prophet, we decided to change the main principle of the game and turn it towards the future. We are currently working on a new version and heard your most important feedback. With Savage Hunt comes a complete re-launch of the title. The new servers are already waiting to be launched. Since quality means a lot to us, we are currently conducting intense stress tests and are checking the game especially in the light of our new features.

name: SamuTale
summary: SamuTale is a samurai-themed sandbox survival MMO. The game is currently in early access.

name: Sail of Dreams
summary: Sail the sea and pilot your own ship to battle various vessels in quest of gold and glory! Upgrade your cannons, add a piercing prow to the bow, or recruit small cats to help you crew your ship! Find the true goal of a child's mind wandering his own dreams.

name: Samurai Shampoo
summary: Melee-based roguelike dungeon crawler where a fallen samurai must retrieve his stolen Shampoo. Make your run unique by selecting unique perks, picking a weapon when you start a run, picking up items and weapons from chests, and buying them from shops.

name: Saint Seiya: Exclamation
summary: Saint Seiya: Exclamation is a Brazilian RPG fangame with characters in the SD (Super Deformed) style.
