The story continues in an original way with the series, but with the addition of two new characters: Yusei from Vulpecula and Aki from Apus! The new characters were introduced so that the game follows a new line and is not too predictable for the player! When starting the game you can choose between Male (Yusei) and Female (Aki), each of which has exclusive stories in the game!

name: Saint Seiya: Caos Chapter
summary: Saint Seiya: Chaos Chapter created by Yuri Fernandes is a Brazilian Knights of the Zodiacs fangame divided into chapters where the world is in Chaos and it is up to the golden knights to restore peace to the world.

name: Sakura Hime 3
summary: You have just graduated school and have landed your first job as a butler for the luxury apartments "Sakura Gardens." Your main goal is to become an excellent butler who gives the girls all the pleasure and happiness they need!

name: Sakura Hime 2
summary: Surrounded by many beautiful girls, a mind-blowing, sexy journey in Fairyland has started. While enjoying the time with a lively cat girl, passionate bunny girl, mysterious witch, or an incredible magician, do you want to save the world at the same time?

name: Salvation of Sisyphus
summary: In this high-stakes, foddian platformer you can finally find out if Sisyphus is happy after all. Equipped with only your pet rock, suffer trials and tribulations - come out a changed person. Join Sisyphus on his journey to salvation and reach the top together! What awaits him there is incredible...

name: Salad Fields
summary: Adventure puzzle game with surreal places and weirdo characters. Meet a gay leather-mouse, magical furry boyfriends, a computer who is afraid of Y2K, and more!

name: Sacrificial Lighthouse
summary:
Sacrificial Lighthouse is a small but atmospheric story that won’t leave you indifferent.
You play as a girl named Maya, who finds herself on a strange island with a lighthouse during a storm. What is this strange place? How and why did you get here?
Do you dare to find out the truth and what you are willing to sacrifice for it?

name: Sakura Battle
summary: Relive the fighting of the 'Sakura Arms' with cute animated SD graphics!

name: Sanctuary in Time
summary: A text-based, adult game with sci-fi & RPG elements!

name: Sacred Stones
summary: Retro sidescrolling action and adventure greet you in Sacred Stones! The indie atmosphere is easy to immerse yourself in. Have a great time as you explore, run/jump & fight your way to victory. This game is perfect for both hardcore and casual fans alike seeking that nostalgic-indie fix!

name: Sacred Almanac Traces of Greed
summary: Chief Engineer Jonathan Finch had gone missing after a powerful railroad tunnel explosion and the ensuing investigation has forced the company to freeze all work on the track. As the main investigator, you discover that the collapse may not be related to natural events, but rather a mysterious and ancient civilization. Can you dig up the truth in this hidden object mystery?

name: Sages Of Kaboom
summary: A fantasy and funny schmup game, with a retro vibe within. The player controls a fighter jet plane which shoots unlimited laser pellets and limited rocket ammo, which deals double damage to bosses.

name: Sad Satan
summary: Sad Satan is a PC game built with the Terror Engine that was allegedly made by Gary Graves. While a version with illegal content does exist, this page tracks the unofficial sanitized release that removed the illegal content.

name: Safari Race
summary:
Safari Race is a racing game for the SG-1000, developed and published by Sega in 1984. The player must drive through various "sections", avoiding wildlife and other cars while making sure not to run out of fuel.

The game is notable for using licensed cars, potentially the first video game to do so. The player controls a Lancia Stratos HF, and according to the box art, some of the rival cars are Audi Quattros. The Lancia Stratos would receive greater video game recognition in Sega's later creation Sega Rally Championship.

name: Sammy Sosa Softball Slam
summary:
Sammy Sosa Softball Slam brings the ultra-popular game of softball to the PlayStation game console for the first time ever for an entirely new game experience! 
 
Step up to the plate for more fast-paced game play as you knock out doubles and triples. All this over-the-top action comes screaming at you through a non-stop barrage of instant camera cuts combined with sizzling special effects, side-splitting animations and a bombastic announcer guaranteed to keep you on your toes and wanting more!

name: Saeki Chizu Shiki Yumemihada: Dream Skincare
summary: A skincare game for your DS

name: Sakura no Kumo: Scarlet no Koi - Complete Limited Edition
summary:
Box contents:
- Game: Sakura no Kumo * Scarlet no Koi
- B2 tapestry
- Consumer version "Sakura no Kumo ＊ Scarlet no Koi" Opening Song "Yumemi Hanabira"
- Telegram version Memo Book

name: Sakura Sakura
summary: Sakura Sakura is a romantic comedy about two overbearing Sakuras and their light-hearted love triangle. Follow the story of Tohru Inaba as he attempts to navigate the complicated see-saw of love.

name: Sailing Era: Adventure of 2233
summary: Help the mysterious girls from bilibili to find the pearl!

name: Sammon Salat
summary:
Can you sing to Joukahaisen swamp? Do you know how to catch a moose on skis? Who was Kullervo, and was there more than Kalevala stories sung at the Kalevala?

Sammon Salat is a new way to experience the Finnish national epic Kalevala. The application contains a shortened version of Lönnrot's Kalevala for schools, gamified scenes, a lot of learning material and tasks related to Elias Lönnrot and the old poetry song culture. The application is suitable for educational use in schools and for anyone interested in the subject, regardless of age.

name: Santa World
summary: Join the festive adventure and help Santa Claus in his quest to save Christmas in this captivating platformer game, Santa World!

name: Saikyou Ginsei Shogi
summary: A WiiWare entry in the Ginsei Shogi series.

name: Saintess Alasdair is Dead
summary:
Saintess Alasdair was hailed in Filigree and the kingdoms beyond as the reincarnation of the morning Goddess. Beautiful, pious and powerful, she was forever victorious in battle and perfect in her devotion.

But now the Saintess is dead, her body scattered over the battle field like weeds after rain.

You are Gwendolyn, the Saintess’s much less impressive sister, and your marriage to the King of Assynia will fix whatever complications the Saintess left behind.

You will not fail.

name: Saga: Rage of the Vikings
summary: Saga: Rage of the Vikings is a Strategy game, developed and published by Cryo Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1999.

name: Sakura Succubus 8
summary: The eighth part of the Sakura Succubus series is finally here! Join Hiroki and his loyal harem as they try to help Alice overcome her greatest challenge yet: trying to find a job.

name: Sagashi ni Ikouyo
summary: You are a young adventurer, looking for challenge. Travel through deep dungeons and battle those who would seek to stop you. A large cast of characters aid and propel players in this treasure hunting, monster battling adventure game. Magic, weaponry and team cooperation will see them through their quests.

name: Sailor Moon: La Luna Splende
summary: Sailor Moon La Luna Splende (The Shining Moon) is an Italian Sailor Moon puzzle-adventure Nintendo DS game. It is the only Sailor Moon game on the Nintendo DS and the only one to be exclusively released in a non-Japanese country.

name: Santa Monica Paradise
summary: “Santa Monica Paradise” is a romantic comedy visual novel and dating sim set in sunny Santa Monica. Play as a famous chef visiting California and meeting new people.

name: Saint Seiya RPG: Asgard Chapter
summary: Saint Seiya RPG: Asgard Chapter is a game developed on RPG Maker 2000 based on the Asgard phase of the anime Saint Seiya. It is completely freeware, and uses images and music different from both the anime and other games.

name: Samurai Shodown! 2
summary:
Samurai Shodown! 2 is a handheld game in SNK's Samurai Shodown series of fighting games. Unlike its predecessor, it was released on the Neo-Geo Pocket Color system, so its graphics were no longer monochrome.

It was designed as a conversion from the most recent game in the Samurai Shodown series, Samurai Shodown 64: Warriors Rage, and almost all of its story events, endings and cutscenes are derived from its arcade cousin. Almost all of the characters from Samurai Shodown 64: Warriors Rage are included (the sole exception being Hanma Yagyu). It also re-added two series favorites who were not in the arcade, Charlotte and Yagyu Jubei.

name: Sai
summary:
A short horror game where you play a young girl looking for her parents, she gets lost during a storm and finds herself stuck in a house full in danger.

Solve the puzzles and get her back to her family alive... if you can.

name: Saint Seiya: Legends of Justice
summary: Saint Seiya: Legends of Justice is a licensed adaptation of the Saint Seiya manga, produced by the original team, with high-quality graphics that recreate the classic plot. Follow Seiya, Ikki, Shiryu, Hyoga, and Shun as they venture into the Sanctuary, challenge the 12 Gold Saints, destroy the Pope's conspiracy, and save the goddess Athena.

name: Saving Private Sheep 2
summary: Saving Private Sheep is back in this wacky brain & puzzle game!

name: Save Giant Girl From Monsters 4
summary: A flight simulator game. Save the giant girl from the monsters attacking her using a helicopter.

name: Sakura Mau Otome no Rondo: Anata to Miru Fuyu Sakura
summary: A fandisc for the visual novel Sakura Mau Otome no Rondo.

name: Safelight
summary: Safelight is the debut first-person puzzle horror game from STEALTH Studios. Navigate through a vacant cruise ship stuck at sea, as you uncover the mystery of how entire portions of the ship have vanished.

name: Sakigake!! Otokojuku: Meikoushima Kessen
summary: This is a game for the Sakigake!! Otokojuku series for the Game Boy.

name: Save The Deal
summary: A nostalgic retro game with a sticker-collecting mission! Watch the moving stickers closely and send the right coordinates on the chat to get them and fill the sticker card. The more you get, the more you advance!

name: Saru Get You: Pipo Saru Racer
summary: A racing game in the Ape Escape series. The player builds a Pipo monkey into a racing machine, and competes in races.

name: Santa Slays Nazis
summary: Play as Santa Claus in this Christmas adventure and defend the North Pole against the Nazis! In this third-person shooter, you can go at it alone or have Mrs. Claus join you in the fun as player 2 with local split screen co-op. Fight to save not only Christmas, but the world!

name: Saikyou Todai Shogi
summary: Saikyou Todai Shogi (aka Saikyou Toudai Shougi) is a shogi game with different game modes vs another human player or computer opponents.

name: Save the Creatures
summary:
* Creatures Need Your Help *
Help to direct creatures through danger and get home. Different obstacles will try to stop you but you will have items to help but they will be limited....

How many can you save??

name: Saturnine
summary:
Saturnine - a horror survival adventure.

In Saturnine you will explore abandoned villages and the woods of Nearna. But beware: Nightfall comes closer and something mystifying and evil is awaiting you in the shadows of the darkness!

name: Save the Dodos
summary: Save the Dodos! We’re all familiar with the sad tale of the charming, yet unintelligent Dodo. But now you can prevent their heart-breaking tale of extinction! Guide the dodos through 100 challenging levels and save our avian dullards from extinction.

name: Sapphire Snowe: The Bear, The Beast & The Blizzard
summary: Help save Saffie from herself in this cozy but dark winter fairy tale.

name: SandStrike.io
summary:
Are you ready for the ultimate adrenaline-fueled adventure in the desert? SandStrike is the game for you! This action-packed multiplayer shooting game is perfect for people who want to experience the excitement of high-speed battles and outmaneuvering their opponents.

With four different game modes to choose from, including classic team deathmatch and capture the flag, SandStrike offers endless possibilities for thrilling gameplay. And with a wide range of customizable weapons and equipment, you can tailor your loadout to suit your play style and dominate the competition.

name: Sailor Cats 2: Space Odyssey
summary:
Sailor Cats embark on a new journey in space!
Looks like building a cardboard rocket wasn’t such a good idea after all because it exploded! Now all your cats are missing in space and you’ll have to find them! But don’t worry because you’ll also find lots of new friends - and marvelous creatures - along the way.

name: Sagittarius
summary: Competitive cosmic archery!

name: Safari Cannon
summary: A wholesome game, where you shoot across the African Safari and discover all the wild beasts of the savannah.

name: Sauna of The Dead
summary: Sauna of the DEAD is an action RPG where you become a wave master, swinging your towel to blast hot air at zombies and demons in the saunas of the underworld, sending them to ascend. Power up with sauna goods and drinks to blast the underworld's inhabitants into ascension.

name: Sanxion
summary: Sanxion is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up, the goal to traverse each level from left to right avoiding or destroying any enemies and obstacles. The side-scroller speed is controllable, increasing the closer the player is to the center of the screen. The screen is divided in two sections, the upper one with a cenital view, and the lower one, taking up two-thirds of the screen, shows a typical side view. Enemies can come from both sides of the screen in close formations that the player must avoid colliding with.

name: Sacraboar
summary:
Sacraboar is an RTS game in which players have to capture their opponent's boar trophy. Featuring an intuitive and easy to use resource management system, the game offers fast-paced game play without lengthy and tedious construction phases.

During the game players can build towers, which either give them access to powerful spells or increase their budgets for producing units.

Get yourself some awards in league and cup competitions as well as bronze, silver, and gold medals in over 80 challenging missions and battle it out against human opponents via LAN.

name: Sakura Taisen 3: Paris ha Moeteiru ka?
summary: Sakura Wars 3 takes place following the events of Sakura Wars 2. Series protagonist Ichiro Ogami joins the newly formed Paris Assault Troupe to train their own Flower Division, an all-female unit dedicated to fighting supernatural threats against the city while maintaining their cover as a cabaret act. The Paris Assault Troupe must learn to work together to defend their city against a series of mysterious phantoms seeking vengeance against Paris for their fallen ancient civilization.

name: SAGE 5: Event the Game
summary: In 2002, that year's second SAGE was itself a fan game, which contained all of the usual information and booths. The player could choose from a number of characters to explore a virtual SAGE show floor, visiting booths and trying out games. Some special mini games could be unlocked.

name: Saturn Bomberman Fight!!
summary: Saturn Bomberman Fight!! is a 1997 maze video game developed and published by Hudson Soft for the Sega Saturn. It is the second Bomberman game for the Saturn, after Saturn Bomberman. It features full 3D graphics unlike previous titles in the series.

name: Saint Seiya: Rising Cosmo
summary:
Saint Seiya Rising Cosmo, a new generation Saint 3DRPG!
Recreate the world of Saint Seiya and bring back that excitement with a story faithful to the original! All the saints you know and love are here! Gather your characters and form your own team to make your dream matchup a reality! Summon saints from the stars with a new gacha system that uses the AR function!

name: Sabreman Stampede
summary: Sabreman Stampede is the second stage of development of Donkey Kong Racing. The game evolved from being a Donkey Kong game to being part of the Sabreman series by Rare, due to the company being bought by Microsoft. The game was being developed to be released for the XBOX 360, but ended up being cancelled.

name: Santa's Adventure: Christmas Gifts Rush
summary: Dash, collect and celebrate!

name: Santa Claus no Takara-bako
summary:
One month a year, we celebrate this season, thank you for the wonderful memories.
And in appreciation for this year, while people send the gifts, Christmas is for us a time to round off the memories of one year, a time to give those close words of gratitude in a Christmas card.

Thank you for the wonderful memories this year.
With feeling of gratitude, our gift to you.
Merry Christmas.

name: Saghala: Heroes of the Last World
summary: 2081. Earth, now known as Saghala, was destroyed by nuclear war and coronal mass ejections. Despite the devastation, humanity lingers on. Sixty years after the End, four factions vie for control of the Core, the last fusion reactor. Decide the fate of Saghala in a classic, top-down cRPG!

name: Sam's Journey
summary: Fast paced all directional scrolling platformer for the C64

name: Sack of Bots
summary: Drift with your car around a horde of bots and blast them away. Havoc, decimation and annihilation as you slide, crash and crunch through the opposition in this simple arcade shoot 'em up.

name: Sailboat Explorer
summary: Sailing Simulator to discover some quirky places!

name: Saucy Boy Adventures
summary: Help Saucy Boy obtain condiments for his girlfriend, Saucy Girl, in this brisk and breezy cute-em-up adventure.

name: Save the Universe, Please!
summary: Take command of the crew of the ESS Shyp, explore planets, and deal with friendship, betrayal and maybe love! It's up to you to Save the Universe! It's your choice, so Please, don't let the Universe down!

name: Sacreligious
summary: Just a fun little map i decided to release as a new years present to the community.

name: Sadturn
summary: A short autobiographical maze game. It's 2171. You are a human born in the Saturnian shellworld, a habitational megastructure built between the icy rocks in Saturn's rings. Searching for a life as a sailor, you embark on a journey to Earth.

name: Satori
summary: Satori is a Hack & slash game made as a final Master Degree project. Immerse yourself in a world of samurai and mystical creatures in this Japanese Hack & Slash. Master deadly skills as you unleash mayhem and honour in epic battles.

name: Save Your Camp
summary:
In this game you can play one of six characters, whose task is to survive together with other survivors, as well as defend the camp that is so important to you. Fight against over twenty unique zombies in various ways, using simple traps or even automatic turrets. You can also take your case and use your weapon.
Do everything to avoid eating, remember SAVE YOUR CAMP!

name: Samurai Shodown
summary:
The Game Boy version of Samurai Shodown includes all the characters, stages, and most of the special moves, but has no combos, fatalities, or voices. All the music tracks are included, albeit in scaled-down form.
It also features two new characters: Kuroko and Hikyaku.

name: Saiminjutsu o Tameshitara Onaji Mansion no Bakunyuu Hitozuma ga Ore no Mono ni Natta
summary: A visual novel from Lust Bit.

name: SAT Prep Math 2008
summary: Study for the SAT test on your iPod

name: Saints Row
summary: Saints Row is a gritty 3rd person action/shooter game based on the XBOX 360 title from THQ. In the game you play as a member of the 3rd Street Saints on a mission to rise through the ranks and take over the city from rival gangs, one District at a time. Remember that your actions can have consequences so it is up to you to decide how best to make it to the top. Enough Talk. Let's Play.

name: Sakura Tempest
summary:
You will be playing Shōtarō, an average boy trying to survive his college years. Through his first year at his new college, many adventures await him – especially once he gets involved with four handsome upperclassmen!
Will he spent summer in the mountains with his childhood friend? Or train with the sports club? Or maybe go to the beach with the student council? Or get in trouble with a certain delinquent?

name: Samenai Akumu no Hate de Odorou.
summary:
The main character, Takumu, is imprisoned in a mysterious hospital infested with strange monsters.

Takumu tries to escape, but he is always interrupted by the nurses.

Will Takumu survive safely and be able to escape from the hospital...?

name: Samurai Shodown: Sogetsu Kazama
summary: This digital purchase will unlock the DLC character "SOGETSU KAZAMA" for your copy of SAMURAI SHODOWN.

name: Save The Toast!
summary:
Flappy bird has nothing on this toast-chomping monster! Hone in your skills and take the toast challenge! Help this little toast monster find his toast!

This game includes 10 levels of action-packed adventure! Play in the bright happy sun, as well as a cloudy rainy day. Change the weather as the decade, because "Save the Toast" Now includes 3 never before seen Vintage levels.

name: Sakura Melody
summary: Play as Ren, a rookie producer in the idol industry, and help him shape three beautiful young women into multi-talented superstars. Plan your idols' routines, help them accrue fans, and beat your competition, while finding time to take your girls out on steamy dates.

name: Sayonara Umihara Kawase Smart
summary:
This is a 2D platform game using a rubber rope. You can play 10 free stages.

"Sayonara UmiharaKawase Smart" is a 2D platform game where the goal is to clear every stage.
The rules are very simple: Using a rubber rope with a lure at the tip, you can hang on walls or ceilings and catch enemies while aiming for the exit inside the stage.

name: SAT Prep Writing 2008
summary: Study for the SATs on your iPod

name: Saudi Drift
summary:
Play drifting and racing in Saudi Style.
Saudi Drift, drifting and racing and realistic graphics.

name: Salvation in Corruption
summary: A world of magic, monsters, gods, and riches is on the horizon! Choose your path in an ever expanding world! Adventure awaits!

name: Sand Scorpion
summary: A vertically scrolling shoot'em up.

name: Salome's Kiss
summary: A lesbian gothic romance tale set in Victorian England, in which an anxious governess is aggressively pursued by her unruly, tempestuous pupil.

name: Santa's Factory
summary:
This holiday, there're too many good kids in the world. As usual, good kids will get a present from Santa in this holiday. But before that, you gotta help Santa to wrap all the presents.

In Santa's Factory, there's no room for one mistake. Your job is to deliver each present to the correct place. Press [Left] or [Right] to move the pipe, then press [A Button] to push the present into the box. If you create a single mistake (Misplacing the present or one present got skipped) you will break Santa's Factory and many kids hearts since they didn't get any present.

name: Salt the Earth
summary: Salt the Earth is a multi-unit arena-brawler designed only for online competitive players.

name: Santa-kun
summary:
A nameless otaku (which roughly corresponds to the English geek, albeit with a focused "nerdiness" in all things anime) encounters an aggressively-looking Santa Claus, who offers to test his knowledge; if he succeeds, he can have his way with a few magically summoned beautiful girls...

Santa-kun is a quiz simulation. Santa asks a question, and the player must choose the correct answer among the three available ones. The game consists of several "matches"; in the beginning of each, a fully dressed young girl is introduced. A match consists of three rounds (25 questions all together); after each round, the girl removes part of her clothing. Upon successful completion of a match, the girl is shown fully naked.

The questions revolve (with a few exceptions) around video games and computer technology.

name: Sacred Ember
summary: Sacred Ember is currently a simple PvP fighter jet dogfighting game with realistic flight physics. The game aims to expand into an open-world fantasy military action-RPG.

name: Salamander
summary: The MSX port of Salamander (沙羅曼蛇, Saramanda) is significantly different from the original and any other ports. New to this port is a graphical introduction that introduces human pilots for each ship, as well as names for each stage. The levels are notably longer than the arcade original, and the player is forced to start from a pre-defined checkpoint upon death of either pilot, instead of starting where he left off. After level two, the player can choose the order of the next three stages. In addition, the player can collect "E" capsules by destroying certain enemies. Collecting fifteen will permanently upgrade one of the available weapons on the power-up bar. Some weapons allow the player ships to merge, one player controlling movements and the second player controlling weapons. Instead of the Vic Viper and the Lord British Space Destroyer, the ships are known as the Sabel Tiger and the Thrasher; piloted by human characters named Iggy Rock and Zowie Scott. The story takes place in the year 6709 A.D and has 2 different endings. The MSX version was re-released for the Wii's Virtual Console in Japan on January 12, 2010. It was later released for the Wii U's Virtual Console on July 20, 2016. They were also made available for the Project EGG on Windows Store on May 19, 2015.

name: Sandbox Skyline
summary: Build impressive skyscrapers Pixel by Pixel, and protect them from the harsh realities of nature. Each pixel is physically simulated to interact with earthquakes, firestorms, blizzards, and tsunamis. Protect your skyline and expand your territory in this relaxing (yet challenging) sandbox builder.

name: Samurai Beatdown
summary: Samurai Beatdown is a scrolling slash-em-up with rhythm action gameplay.

name: Saddies: Attack!!
summary: "Saddies: Attack!!" is an arcade game for Android and PC released in 2017 by Modoka.

name: Satella-Q: Nihon Series Q-kaiura 2 Out Manrui! Naze ka Squeeze!
summary: A single-episode season of Satella-Q.

name: Save Elizy
summary: Save Elizy - is a cooperative survival horror game for 1-4 players. Your path is blocked by demons who will leave you without limbs. Run and hide, save Eliza, but remember - don't let yourself be taken to Hell.

name: Sandcastles
summary: A brief rumination on permanence.

name: Savage Turret
summary: Tactical turret placing game with gore, gardening and massive battles. You build the routes for the enemies to facilitate that sweet killzone. And take a break to do some gardening afterwards. Plant on!

name: Saving Astral
summary: Somewhere among the stars awaits a remedy for your Mother. Search a vast mysterious Planet on the verge of collapse while fighting to survive. What perils await you? What will become of the Planet? What legacy will you carve into the skies? What fate awaits your Mother.

name: Sailing Stone
summary: Sailing Stone is a 3D roller arcade indie game.Pass through 50 levels as fast as you can and try become number one on the leaderboard.

name: SatellaWalker 2: Moku-moku Kemuri Panic
summary: SatellaWalker 2: Moku-moku Kemuri Panic is the first part of SatellaWalker 2, released in 1998 for the Satellaview, with SoundLink support.

name: Save New York
summary: "Save New York" is a shooter where the action takes place on one screen only; but there are lots of things going on on that screen. You see blue sky over skyscrapers and subway tunnels beneath. New York is under attack, and you are a pilot in a little blue airplane who must save it from destruction caused by aliens. At the beginning of each stage, the aliens begin to drop from the sky. Your goal is to cruise around in your plane and to shoot them, preferably before they descend on a building, because then they will begin to crush it until it is destroyed completely. Once you have disposed of such an alien wave, you enter the next stage, with tougher and more numerous foes. Your plane might run out of fuel; in this case, you must pick up fuel left by friendly planes who appear sometimes on the screen. Often an alien will lay an egg on the ground, and a newly born baby will immediately begin to destroy the buildings from below. To prevent this, you will have to leave your craft, enter the dangerous subway tunnels, and dispose of the young alien using your handgun.

name: Samurai Wish
summary: Based on the japanese folklore of the "wish trees", become a member of the Wishmakers' Clan. Defeat your enemies brutally with your katana or your shurikens to fulfill people's dreams.

name: Sakura Taisen Monogatari: Mysterious Paris
summary: Sakura Taisen Monogatari: Mysterious Paris is a side story that takes place shortly before Sakura Wars 4 and was released for the Playstation 2 on March 18, 2004 in Japan and Taiwan.

name: Salto Mortadella
summary: Brave Salto Mortadella's perilous heights! Navigate treacherous platforms, precarious ledges, and perilous jumps. A misstep means tumbling down. The stakes are high in this thrilling platforming adventure!

name: Save Scummer
summary:
Save Scummer is a Seven Day Roguelike written by Jeff Lait.

It is a unique twist on roguelikes where you do not control the character directly. Instead, all you do is save/restore or perform undos, (both types of save scumming) in an attempt to reach victory.

name: Saints Row IV: Enter the Dominatrix
summary: Enter the Dominatrix reveals the wild hijinx of the original vision of the canceled SR3 expansion. Steelport has been taken over by the Dominatrix and only the Saints can stop her from trapping everyone in a virtual prison! Includes behind-the-scenes commentary and the return of some fan-favorite characters.

name: Saints Row IV - Reverse Cosplay Pack
summary: Become the Avatar of the Saints Row Community with the Reverse Cosplay Pack. Chosen from the best of our fans' entries to our Reverse Cosplay contest, two outfits were handpicked and turned into in-game outfits! Wear the Genki Space Pimp outfit to end Zin filibusters in style, or don the Freckle Bitch's outfit to deliver justice the Saints way.

name: Save the Body
summary:
Save the Body is a First-person game about the Human Body.
The objective is to kill all germs in the body and unlock all infected cells and win the game

name: Same Game and Robots
summary:
Strategy and planning is the name of the game regardless which title you choose to test your wits against. Learn to analyze and predict how the game will unfold to achieve the most points and successful completion. Welcome to the peaceful world of SameGame and the tense world of Robots. Either choice is an addicting path. 
 
SAMEGAME - There are three different pieces on the board. Connect as many shapes of one type to score higher points and clear the board. The two variations of the game only have different game rules. 
 
ROBOTS - Move the cursor to destroy all the Robots on the screen by making them collide into each other, by making them hit their left over scrap, or by using a bomb.

name: Sakura Gym Girls
summary: Shouhei is an average man who works at a second-hand bookshop with his sweet, shy colleague, Asa. His life is unremarkable, until Asa suggests that they join their local gym. There, Shouhei meets two attractive women, and his love life begins to look up.

name: Samurai Warriors: State of War
summary: Samurai Warriors: State of War is a portable version of Samurai Warriors, however, it is not a straight conversion and is made to more resemble Dynasty Warriors, giving it an "Samurai Warriors Empires" style of playing. The gameflow is mainly separated into two stages: the Strategy phase and the Action phase. During the first stage, the map is separated into colored squares and the player is asked to move their character in a turn-based fashion. Terrain affects how the player can act during this stage. What usually follows is the action phase, which asks the player to defeat as many opponents possible within 60 seconds. These stages can tip the battle in the player's favor. There are four main armies for the player to participate in: the Takeda (Western), Uesugi (Eastern), Nobunaga, or the solo army. Completing the game with these four factions unlocks the final stage in the game. It guest stars characters from Dynasty Warriors 4. The game features a Story mode, Free mode and VS mode.

name: Sakura Hime
summary: After your nap in the spring, you slowly wake up. What comes into your eyesight are a foggy patio… and a girl who looks like a witch. What is ahead of you in this bizarre journey? A beautiful encounter, or a lurking trap?

name: Samui kara Nabe Kuitai ne Joon-chan to!!
summary:
Let's complete a tasty nabe that will satisfy Joon-chan.
This is such a non-stop shiritori dark nabe simulation.

name: Samurai G
summary: Become the Shining Samurai of legend! Samurai G is a non-stop action game that will challenge players of all levels! As Tetsuo, you must collect as much of Tengu’s Gold as possible before the evil Warlord Fuma’s assassins do.

name: Saihate Enabler
summary:
Takayuki is a caring and helpful person. He always delivered notes and handouts used in class to his childhood friend Hikaru, who was a shut-in and didn't go to school.

Because Hikaru is shy and timid, he needs me to accompany him.
Feeling this way, Takayuki heads to Hikaru's house today to take care of Hikaru...

A short BL visual novel about psychological dependence.

name: Saint Ceri
summary: An adult otome with three love interests and monogamous and poly routes! Play as Saintess Ceridwen, an overworked saintess pressured to get engaged in two weeks' time. Can you find love with one -or more- of your suitors? Will you marry for love or duty, or find a way to avoid marriage entirely?

name: Samurai Riot: Definitive Edition
summary: Samurai Riot: Definitive Edition is a 2D Arcade-style Beat ‘Em Up game with a unique co-op system. Make deep moral choices throughout the branching storyline with high replay value and all-new improvements!

name: Saikyou Todai Shogi 2
summary: Saikyou Todai Shogi 2 is a shogi game that features different difficulty levels, different game modes (vs, training, tournament, etc.), etc. The game features also an auto mode in which the player can watch and learn how to play watching the different computer movements.

name: Save Data
summary: A byte-sized rogue-lite anti-shoot-em-up! Deflect and shoot down projectiles in 3 worlds of crazy bullet-heck action with semi-randomized room order and an upgrade system that provides a bevy of interesting ways to progress!

name: Sapiens
summary: An adventure game, published by French studio Loriciels, where the player controls an early example of Homo Sapiens as he survives and fights off hostile Neanderthal rivals.

name: Savage Age
summary: Embark on a Wild Journey, Reclaim the Totem

name: Sakura Knight 2
summary: Estelle's adventure continues in the sequel to Sakura Knight, as she strives to become a knight like her mother. Accompanied by the ditzy Felicia, the mischievous Tart, and the affectionate Rune, Estelle faces a new foe, gets kicked out of the local hot springs, and kisses a lot of cute girls!

name: Santa's Workshop
summary: Help Santa grow trees and create toys for Christmas and become the biggest toy factory in the world.

name: Sakura Forest Girls
summary: Yaya, a plucky young huntress, and Aiyana, a shy girl born into a family of shamans, go on a journey to find their missing childhood friend, Koko. Along the way they meet a mischievous witch, Maia, and sparks fly.

name: Satella-Q: Kokumin no Q-jitsu
summary: A single-episode season of Satella-Q.

name: Santa's Holiday
summary: Sleighbells are ringing and Christmas is around the corner, but Santa has gone on vacation! Your assistance is urgently needed to make Christmas still happen.

name: Sadakichi Seven
summary: AKA: 定吉七番秀吉の黄金. This is an adventure game based on a comic book series.

name: Sansara Naga 2
summary: Sansara Naga 2 is a Role-Playing game, published by Victor Interactive Software, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Sanzen Sekai Yuugi: Re Multi Universe Myself
summary: An otome game developed by Girls Dynamics. This is a remake of the original PC game with new CGs and new scenarios.

name: Samurai Poodle
summary: A bullied dog takes matters into his own hands against a notorious cat gang.

name: Save HomeWorld
summary: Your orbital platform is the last line of defence. Protect your planet against destruction!

name: Samurai: Way of the Warrior
summary: Become a samurai in this hack'n'slash app for iPhone/iPod Touch.

name: SatellaWalker: Satebo wo Sukuidase!
summary: SatellaWalker: Satebo wo Sukuidase! is the first part of SatellaWalker, released for the Satellaview, with SoundLink support.

name: Sand Pirates
summary: Boat race across the desert

name: Saber y Ganar
summary:
The game of the cultural contest of La2 of TVE presented by Jordi Hurtado arrives. Saber y ganar has completed fifteen years on the air and has become the daily program with more years of broadcasting in the history of television in Spain.

Now you can be a contestant thanks to this RTVE.es game with thousands of questions from real tests of the program and test yourself in the contest.

name: SAS Combat Simulator
summary: Pro Powerboat Simulator is a game that was released on a few 8-bit platforms in 1989.

name: Santa Run
summary: You play for Santa and you need to collect as many presents and dodge of other people and animals so that they do not knock you down.

name: Sakura Succubus 9
summary: In the ninth part of the Sakura Succubus series, Hiroki returns to Astoria with Ayu as she prepares for the concert of a lifetime: a joint show with her fellow idol Mihama Shizuru. Will this concert end in success, and will Hiroki's harem get even bigger?

name: Sakura Magical Girls
summary: Date three magical girls who make a spectacular entry into a beach resort, protecting love itself from the forces of evil in the newest Sakura game from Winged Cloud!

name: Satomi Hakkenden Hamaji Hime no Ki
summary: The sequel of Satomi Hakkenden Hachitama no Ki.

name: Sainte-Vibrisse
summary: A father and daughter set out for a peaceful camping holiday in the deep woods of rural Quebec. But when their car dies on a deserted road, their dream trip turns into a nightmare! No cell signal. No sign of life. Just an empty village, overrun with cats, strange happenings, and a supermarket that somehow… remains open despite no one inside. Are they truly alone? Or have they wandered into the heart of a dark and twisted cult? Sainte-Vibrisse awaits you… if you dare!

name: Sambaquis: A Story before Brazil
summary: Sambaquis - A History Before Brazil is a game developed entirely by archaeologists and allows the player to experience the daily life within an indigenous group about 3000 years before the present in archaeological sites today denominated sambaquis (shellmounds). To perform the funeral of the Elder of your group, explore the ancient Brazilian landscape, talk to people and collect the necessary resources.

name: Sand Land: Custom Vehicle Colors - 3 Types
summary: Customize vehicles with 3 special colors. Colors can be applied to all customizable vehicles.

name: Satan Loves Cake
summary:
SATAN LOVES CAKE.

Like, a lot. But one day, while watching the telly, he realises that he has run out of cake. Join SATAN in a delicious quest through (a bit of) Hell, while eating as much CAKE as possible!

SATAN wields a trident that shoots electric beams, that are able to tramsform his enemies into cake. Meet a host of enemies and bosses - and eat them all!

name: Saber Marionette J: Battle Sabers
summary: On a world with no women, the surviving men have reintroduced the female in the form of an android. Called Marionettes, they are built to serve men and are limited in their interactions with humans. That is until a poor boy named Otaru Mamiya encounters a Marionette named Lime. Lime is a Saber model with a special circuit that gives her emotions. When Otaru awakens two more Saber Marionettes, his life as an 'average' boy quickly becomes as extraordinary as the lives of his eager, busty new friends.

name: Samurai Shodown VI
summary:
Among other series changes, aerial blocking was removed entirely, and the switch-around move, which enabled a player to shift quickly behind the other's back, as well as the dodge (evade, side-step), in which the move virtually brings a semi-3D environment to the defense in attempt to use each sword more effectively.

One can no longer charge one's own "pow" gauge. The off-screen delivery man was omitted entirely from the game. The "CD combo" was added, wherein a player can press the C and D buttons together, triggering a strike that can be followed up by a sequence of button taps.

SNK also added a "suicide" move, wherein one's character forfeits the round. The bonus to this is that the one committing suicide will start the next round with a full "POW" gauge. Certain finishes also enable a "fatality" move in the vein of Mortal Kombat.

name: Say Hello to Sunshine
summary: A map with the general theme of quake areas mixed with some sand areas

name: Samurai Jack: The Shadow of Aku
summary: As the fearless and noble warrior, Samurai Jack, you are thrust into the future where the world has been conquered by your arch foe Aku. Master Jack's signature moves to battle your way through 4 enemy-filled realms and 24 interactive levels. Meet your favorite friends and foes like the Scotsman, Mad Jack and more. Discover a portal that connects you with your ancestors who help guide you through burning villages and down hidden pathways. Free prisoners, dodge fireballs and sword strokes—ultimately defeat Aku once and for all!

name: Sansan
summary:
Sansan (サンサン) is an online service allowing people living in Japan to play the abstract strategy board game Go with other subscribers over the internet on a Windows PC. However, at its launch in 1994, a version for the Sega Mega Drive was also made available. This version of the game allows players who have a Sega Mega Modem to connect over a 33.3kbps or ISDN line to play other members who have a Sansan ID. However, as of 2011, there are no known Mega Drive-compatible Sansan servers. A local two-player version of the game is also included for play. 
 
For whatever reason, the Mega Drive version did not last very long — it is one of the rarest and most sought-after Mega Drive games; Sega of Japan's official archive doesn't list it (despite Sansan Co., Ltd. having T-series code T-147) and a ROM was not dumped until February 2011. The Windows PC version of the service continues to this day.

name: Sapo Xulé: S.O.S. Lagoa Poluída
summary:
Sapo Xulé: S.O.S. Lagoa Poluida is a retooled version of Astro Warrior, released by Tec Toy in 1996 for a Brazilian audience. It was later brought to Portugal.

S.O.S. Lagoa Poluida is virtually identical to Astro Warrior, but now takes place underwater rather than in Space. Astro Warrior had previously been released in Brazil making this the second outing of this game in that region - Portugal did not see Astro Warrior as a stand-alone release, instead in the form of the combo cartridge, Hang-On / Astro Warrior.

name: Satoyama Note Spring Walk
summary: Satoyama note Spring walk is a point-and-click visual novel in which you aim to reach your destination while identifying plants in a satoyama in spring. Listen to the animals, observe and identify the plants as you make your way through the forest, and have lunch under the cherry blossom trees!

name: Salmon Man
summary: Salmon Man is not a game; it's an experience, a test, a gift... to be sent to a certain kind of person, the one you hate from the deepest part of your soul.

name: Saint Dragon
summary: Tenseiryuu: Saint Dragon is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up video game originally released as a coin-op by Jaleco in 1989. It was converted to several home computer platforms by Storm Entertainment in 1990.

name: Sarah, you are way too heavy
summary: Will braving your way with your lover end up as a miserable memory?

name: Savior Fantasy
summary: A steampunk and fantasy MMORPG.

name: Sausage Legend: Arena
summary: Sausage Legend is a 3D physics-based fighting game where players clash their sausages in battle. You take on the role of a medieval slave, forced to fight in the "Sausage Duel," a pastime of the nobility. To gain your freedom, you must emerge victorious in this mad contest.

name: Saturday Night Live: The Game
summary: Live from your living room...it’s Saturday night! Relive your favorite SNL moments straight from TV to iPad in this game for everyone from casual fans to fanatics. Compete on your own against the timer—or challenge your friends to see who’s the biggest fan.

name: Savage Reign
summary:
Savage Reign is a vs. fighting game that offers a dozen fighters, mixing fighting with weapons and a two-plane system like the one seen in the Fatal Fury saga, with which it is possible to get to the back of the stage by climbing to a higher level or climbing up pipes.

Each stage has interactive elements that intervene in the fights, such as falling stalactites, lava jets, spotlights that can be knocked down, and all the characters, have the ability to execute movements based on projectiles, which can be used to chase the opponent when he changes planes, and which can even be reflected.

name: Sakura Day Mahjong
summary: Mysterious Asia awaits you! Over 7 hours of the game and over 100 Mahjong levels to suit any taste.

name: Safety Corp. VR
summary: "Safety Corp." is a VR action game with realistic weapon mechanics, physics, and puzzle elements.

name: Sapper
summary: In Sapper, you play a small anti-pirate. mine-sapper unit. Cleanse local home vessels and exotic alien craft of enemies, mines, and watch vast ships ride to safety as you collect your bounty.

name: Sabrina the Animated Series: Magical Adventure
Sangokushi 3
summary:
THE FATE OF THE HAN DYNASTY IS IN YOUR HANDS!

In the final years of the Eastern Han Dynasty, under the reign of Emperor Ling, ten eunuchs in the imperial palace abused their power. The country was in a dreadful state of affairs; bandits began an uprising, and the people were in turmoil.

The emperor asked the lords of the land to crush the rebellion, but this only resulted in a race for power. After Dong Zhuo usurped the throne only to be quickly defeated, civil war erupted.

Finally, it was Cao Cao who took control of the emperor, commanding the lords in his name. After years of harsh fighting, Cao Cao united the north and prepared to conquer the south in an attempt to unite all of China.

Liu Bei, the fate of the Han Dynasty is in your hands! Will you linger in fear, waiting for death to find you? Or will you take a stand against the evil forces of Cao Cao? Don't hesitate; take your five tiger generals and rush to destroy the enemy!

name: Saint Seiya Online
summary: Saint Seiya Online is a free to play MMORPG from China-based Perfect World, the publisher of Forsaken World, RaiderZ, and Rise of Europe. Based on the Japanese manga series of Saint Seiya and its anime TV series, Saint Seiya Online recreates the epic story that the Knights of the Zodiac battle against the Olympian gods.

name: Santa Monica By Night
summary: A short point and click adventure game made in 7 days for the vampire game jam by 2 people.

name: Sakura Shrine Girls
summary: Two cat girls appear before Toru, a skeptical priest in training. One of them carries herself with dignity and grace, while the other lives her days without a single care. With them, Toru slowly realises that there is more to this world than there seems.

name: Sacred Earth: Alternative
summary: As a lone girl who has awoken after a long slumber, travel through a broken world to remember just what happened, and where all of your friends have gone in this short, post-apocalyptic fantasy Visual Novel/JRPG with tabletop inspired elements.

name: Salomónico
summary:
An interactive experiment inspired by the story of King Solomon.

This is a personal and clumsy relationship about imparting your judgment in crazy situations with sword blows.

You could say that it is in bad taste in many moments, it even gives you the option of cutting a baby in half.

name: Sanma no Meitantei
summary: Sanma no Meitantei is a murder mystery detective adventure game developed and published by Namco for the Famicom in 1987. In the vein of Portopia Renzoku Satsujin Jiken, the player must visit several locations associated with the murder victim, to discover clues which will open up more locations in order to find more clues until ultimately, the identity of the murderer can be confirmed. The game is played entirely in Japanese and was never translated into English. The summary of the story is that while the president Yoshimoto held a party at his villa, Katsura Buntin was found to have been killed in the vault. On top of that, the "Star of Africa" diamond that was stolen from the vault. As detective Sanma Akashiya's assistant, you must help him determine the perpetrators of the incident. The game features a mini game which is a parody of Galaxian, and contains sound effects from other Namco hits such as Dig Dug and Xevious

name: Save the Whales
summary:
Originally to be released in 1983 by 20th Century Fox, this game was not released during the Atari 2600's lifetime. "Save The Whales" is a game in which the player, as a submarine, must protect whales by stopping nets, harpoons, and radioactive waste.

The game was one of three whichs sales were to raise funds for environmental groups. The other two "Dutch Elm Defender" and "Attack of the Baby Seals" were never programmed.

"Save the Whales" was thought to be lost until it was rediscovered in 2002 and thereafter sold at the 2002 Classic Gaming Expo.

name: Saving Diary
summary: Saving Diary is an independent single player storyline card game. A game gift unexpectedly led the female protagonist Hua and her childhood sweetheart Ma Hai into an unknown world. In order to save herself and Hai, Hua embarked on a series of adventures alone in the card world.

name: Sages of Vandaleria: Rebirth of an Empire
summary: Vandaleria. A fallen empire. Since the ruling house was overthrown, it has known only misery and hardship. What it needs is a savior. Embark on an epic RPG adventure, fighting across land and sky, restoring the ancient religion, and retake your birthright! That is, if you are ready to pay the price.

name: Sakura Sunshine
summary: Rei and her pet cat, Koneko, are brainstorming the perfect manga! Battle Rei's adorable inner-thoughts as she overcomes her writer's block, shoot'em-up style!

name: Samurai Sam
summary: A roguelike hack and slasher - 2019 TV Game Jam

name: Sakura Moonlight
summary: The thirtieth game produced by Winged Cloud and the twenty-seventh game in the Sakura series. It is a type of galge game with match 3 elements. It was released in February 2019.

name: Samba de Amigo
summary: The samba-inspired rhythm music game made popular in the arcades is shaking its way onto the Wii! Keeping the beat with over 40 songs on a Samba-inspired sound track, players shake the Wii Remote and Nunchuk like maracas and compete with friends to see who has the best moves. Throughout the dynamic songs there will be opportunities to strike a pose for extra points. Friends and family will be thoroughly entertained cheering each other on as they anxiously await their next turn.

name: Sand Land: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
• Full game
• My Room Furniture Set: Army Base
• My Room Furniture Set: Hideout
• Speed Demon Pack
• Beelzebub Decal Set

SAND LAND is an action RPG where you become the main character as Beelzebub, a Fiend Prince. Lead your company of heroic misfits and explore the legendary world of SAND LAND created by Akira Toriyama.

Use your tact and imagination to develop tanks and other vehicles for your adventures utilizing a wide array of part combinations.

name: Save City R
summary: Introducing "Save City R" – an adrenaline-pumping game where you take on the role of a courageous team of tank fighters on a mission to liberate the сity of R from the grips of the notorious criminal organization known as "Shai Guu".

name: Save The Castle!
summary: Save the Castle is an action packed VR tower defense that places you on the field of battle. Build your army, take over any tower and turn the tide of the war!

name: Sakuna Chronicles: Kokorowa and the Gears of Creation
summary: Spin-off of Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin, the game will tell a spin-off story focused on the brilliant Princess Kokorowa, Sakuna’s close friend, who is a high-ranking goddess presiding over wheels and inventions from her heavenly home.

name: Sakura Sweetheart
summary: The twenty-ninth game produced by Winged Cloud and the twenty-sixth game in the Sakura series. It is a yuri visual novel starring the heroine, Marron. It was released in February 2019.

name: Satanic
summary: Satanic is a first-person survival horror game about escaping a satanic cult. Hunted by a relentless demon that responds to your actions, you must avoid detection, scavenge for resources, and navigate your way through an ex-soviet missile silo deep below the surface.

name: Sarah: Story of a Young Thief
summary: In this point & click puzzle-adventure novel, Sara has been betrayed by criminals and now must solve numerous puzzles to find her stolen money. Join her on her thrilling journey, help her decipher clues, and face the criminals!

name: SaiBorRai
summary: The Meme First-Person Shoot em' up in a Cyberpunk/SteamPunk world. Find Memes, Fight Enemies such as mutants and goons. Pick up your gun, shoot anything that moves and you'll be fine

name: Savage: Resurrection
summary:
The rebirth of the classic action FPS / RTS hybrid "Savage 1" is here! Experience fast-paced combat and cunning strategic gameplay in glorious Unreal 4 environments. Engage in epic 16v16 front-line combat, or take Command to outplay and outmaneuver your team's way to victory. 
 
Savage is a multiplayer-only game with a competitive focus. Combat includes both melee and shooter aspects, and should challenge even seasoned gamers. Servers are currently located in the US and EU, with more planned. Players may also host their own servers, use ours, or play offline!

name: Samurai Shodown: Shiro Tokisada Amakusa
summary: This digital purchase will unlock the DLC character "SHIRO TOKISADA AMAKUSA" for your copy of SAMURAI SHODOWN.

name: Saimin School Days: Hypnotic School Days
summary: The protagonist has acquired an app that can hypnotize others. Is school life with hypnosis bright and fun? Or...

name: SAR: Search and Rescue
summary: When a pioneer spaceship vanishes mysteriously. An investigation reveals that the spaceship crashed near a ravine due to unknown circumstances. Now two SAR (Search and Rescue) operatives are on a mission to find out what happened, and eliminate the alien threat.

name: Satellite Repairman
summary: All the planets in the system have suddenly decided that the galaxy isn’t big enough for all of them! You’re not sure who launched the first missile and it doesn’t really matter! You’ve got nothing to do with it… you are just… the satellite repairman!

name: San Xing Dui
summary: This is a click , Roguelike game inspired by China's Sanxingdui culture. Players can use the left mouse button to attack and the right mouse button to upgrade to unlock the entire Sanxingdui;

name: Satori no Dungeon Oukoku: The Heart Of Crossed Memory -
summary:
Manage all the girls together and complete the 100 story dungeon!
A Touhou parody simulation game where you leave the hard work to others.

name: Save Daddy Trump 4: Maga 2024
summary: Election is coming and 3 evil bosses has again captured Daddy Trump and his Kiki daughter need save him again

name: Sacred X: Heavens Wonderland
summary: Sacred X: Heavens Wonderland is a unique Eastern fantasy open world MMORPG! The game has a large seamless map of more than 60,000 square kilometers. You will embark on a thrilling free adventure in this world full of swords and magic!

name: Sakura Isekai Adventure 2
summary: The second part of the Sakura Isekai Adventure series. A yuri fantasy story about Aki, a young woman on a journey to rescue a kidnapped priestess alongside her companions, who might be more than just fellow party members.

name: Samba de Amigo: Party Central - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Sonic the Hedgehog music DLC pack: Open your heart,
Reach for the Stars (Re-Colors), and I'm Here
- Sonic the Hedgehog and Tails costumes
- Space Channel 5, Super Monkey Ball, and PuyoPuyo costumes and accessories
- More music from SEGA fan-favorites: Space Channel 5, RGG Studio, and Rhythm Thief

name: Sakura Cupid
summary: Lilim, a lazy cupid exiled from Heaven, accidentally makes a human girl fall in love with her while trying to steal a free cup of coffee.

name: Save the Queen
summary: The Skull King has risen once more. As the last bastion against evil, it is your duty to stop him and restore the country to it's peaceful form.

name: Samsara: Stones of Eternity
summary: Samsara: Stones of Eternity is an advanced 3x3 and 6x6 puzzle game. Improve your stagnant brain. Touch and Cycle tiles. You can only touch once to change a tile. Linked tiles change together! 3 consecutive tiles with the same number will explode!

name: Samsara: Deluxe Edition
summary:
While playing in the park, Zee follows a squirrel through a portal to a world of echoes, inhabited by a shadow child. Surrounded by the unknown and trapped in a series of realms both confusing and dangerous, the youngsters must avoid slipping into the pool between dimensions, embarking on a voyage of discovery and awakening they share with the player, up and down staircases, through light and dark, across the upside-down and the right side-up to their eventual freedom.

Samsara is a beautiful, reflective puzzle game set in a world of echoes where players guide a child safely to the exit by dropping blocks of different shapes and properties into a world of two dimensions split by a pool. Simple mechanics conceal complex interactions involving gravity, balance, redirection and teleportation, with a twist: everything added in the upside down world below reflects in the world above.

name: Satella-Q: Nenmatsu Jumbo Takara Quiz - Dai-3-shuu
Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love
summary: Sakura Wars is a Strategy RPG that features a unique sim-based story system. An in-depth storyline exists, much like in any other RPG; however, the player's destiny in the game is not predetermined. Character interaction plays a major role, and your responses to the various characters in the game can ultimately change the story content and even the final outcome. The battle system is divided into two main parts; ground combat and air combat. Ground combat takes place using two-legged mechanized suits, which transform into jet fighters to take the fight to the sky. Every mech unit in the game can transform from battle mech mode to jet fighter mode during combat. Once transformed, weapons and movement methods will change as well. For example, the hero's ground mode utilizes a sword as his main weapon, but in jet mode he will use long-range missiles.

name: Saute Canton
summary: Move from French city to French city with only the names of the places to find your destination

name: Save the Goosey
summary:
Because of an accident, Goosey's home has encountered an unimaginable crisis! Thousands of enemies are coming!

In order to survive, you have no choice but to take on the great responsibility of saving the race - take up arms and join the battle, you will bring hope to the goose family!

Fight against hordes of enemies, eliminate monsters, and complete challenges as a brave man! Make your choice, choose the right weapon for you, let your strength grow, and fight against the tide of monsters! Finally find the way to survive!

Improve your skills and become a warrior with unlimited potential. Survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your agonizing struggle, using the resources gained to develop your potential!

This title was delisted from Google Play on April 23, 2023.

name: Saint Seiya Awakening: Knights of the Zodiac
summary:
Saint Seiya Awakening: Knights of the Zodiac is a mobile game restoring the classic of the Japanese comics. 12 Golden Saints and all classic characters are back to the Sanctuary and waiting for your summon.

In addition, the beautiful game graphics, cool combat effects with the lineup of top Japan Character Voice, brings you the unique audio-visual enjoyment! When the classic theme song sounds on, the cosmo power will burn you up again......

name: Salvagers
summary: A 3rd person game centred around escort missions where you play as a hero trying to save as many people as they can in the middle of a mass take over within 6 minutes. rescue all 15 civilians in the shortest amount of time possible.

name: Sakura Spirit
summary: Rising Judo Star Gushiken Takahiro was two weeks away from the match that would make or break his career – a championship match where the winner is then signed up to be a young national athlete for Japan. He was very determined to win, to fulfill his dre…

name: Saving Private Sheep
summary: Save Private Sheep in this exciting and challenging puzzle game! Can you successfully avoid the hungry wolf and make it home? Find amazing powerups and transform Private Sheep into the power Super Mouton to make your travels easier. Earn countless awards and unlock bonus levels to push your skills to the limit in Saving Private Sheep!

name: Santa's Workshop Challenge: The North Pole Gift Adventure
summary: Discover unpublished and magical stories of Santa Claus, with beautiful illustrations and enchanting music. It's an interactive Christmas adventure for all ages.

name: Satella-Q: Cho-Q! Henka-Q!
summary: A single-episode season of Satella-Q.

name: Sabrina the Animated Series: Zapped!
summary: Sabrina has messed up again: she has turned all of the kids into animals. Now, she must travel through town and change the kids back. In order to turn the kids back, she must hit them and then use her magic on them. There are a number of power-ups available to help Sabrina on her quest, including quadruple jumps, a butt stomp, and warping abilities. She can also collect five stars that will allow her to change the kids back without having to stun them first. However, there are areas in each stage that Sabrina cannot reach. So she must find Salem, who can crawl through small spaces and use his tail to knock over blocks to clear a path for Sabrina. Getting through a level will require planning and skill, so put on your thinking cap. Help Sabrina return her classmates to normal in SABRINA THE ANIMATED SERIES: Zapped!

name: Samurai Jack: The Amulet of Time
summary: Samurai Jack is a warrior who is banished by the shape-shifting wizard Aku into the bizarre and twisted future. Bearing his new futuristic name, Jack wanders the land searching for a portal back in time to right the wrongs of the past. He has learned of a mysterious Amulet that, when all its pieces are found, will enable him to return to the past.. Join Samurai Jack on a journey of honor and revenge through a futuristic world filled with wonders and help him rid the world of evil once and for all.

name: Samus Goes to the Fridge to Get a Glass of Milk 3D
Saga of Song
summary: Saga of Song is a fast-paced single-screen Platformer and a continuation of the Legend of Song. The game is filled with Imagination, complete with competitive online hi-scores and controller support, and fraught with plenty of flavor and danger for you to enjoy! Each randomly generated game consists of 9 Stages which contain treasure and stars to collect in order to maintain the Song and (completely) clear (3x) in order to progress.

name: SamOrai
summary: The samOrai of the school of the first dawn, must wipe out all the demons born from the souls of the miserable. Join him throughout his adventures, defeating enemies in more than 20 scenarios and with more than 10 outfits. Casual hack-and-slash game where you can compete with other users to reach the top of the leaderboards.

name: Santa Fe Mysteries: Sacred Ground
summary:
Sacred Ground is the sequel to the adventure game Santa Fe Mysteries: The Elk Moon Murder and quite similar in gameplay. The player has five days (eight hours each) to solve a case.

Randa Tasker, the wife of a local business man, has been kidnapped. With the help of a PDA and your assistant detective John Night Sky, you have to find clues and interview suspects and witnesses. Since there is not enough time to interrogate them all, choices must be made.

The game's interface is point-and-click. The locations you visit are photograph stills and the game is interspersed with Full Motion Video (FMV) movies. The main screen shows a calendar which shows the number of days you have left, a sun dial showing the number of hours left today and an icon for your PDA. Within the PDA there are icons for e-mail, suspects and evidence.

name: Sanctum 2: The Pursuit
summary:
Pursue the Titan through the outskirts of Elysion One! This expansion adds even more replayability through four completely new maps! Use two new towers, including the Mind-Control Spire that takes control of enemies and lets them fight for you! Unlock new devastating weapons, such as the Drone Launcher, that launches target-seeking drones that home in on enemies and shoot lazors on them. They'll be all like "NOO NOT THE BEEES!"

Of course, there are going to be new enemies as well, such as the Heavy Pup that's far more aggressive than it's older equivalent, and the flying Bliskeblaske, which you'll just have to see for yourself.

Finally, you'll be getting seven new unlockable perks as well - for example, the Reinforcements perk has a chance to spawn Explorers with shields every time you kill an enemy!

name: Sanctum 2: The Last Stand
summary:
Return to the Arc Islands for The Last Stand! Lume activity has increased exponentially and you and your fellow Core Guardians find yourselves more outnumbered than ever. Even out the odds by Utilizing the new Orbital Strike Relay tower and smash down a lazer from the sky into their FACE! Defend the Core on four new maps, one of them being a remake of the classic old Arc map. To help you face the new enemies in The Last Stand, the Bright Foundation has placed the most powerful weapon you've seen so far on three of the four new maps - The Rolfinator Defensive Turret, a turret that you can actually jump inside yourself and control to obliterate the enemies from afar.

Of course, you'll have other new weapons as well, such as the high-tech Smatterband, an industrial weapon that fires sticky bombs that erupt into 10 smaller explosions each, and you'll get to unlock 8 new perks!

name: Sanctum 2: Road to Elysion
summary:
Play as the mysterious new character TSYGAN, a rogue insurgent that joins the Core Guardians in defending the only enclave of humanity left on the planet LOEK III. Road to Elysion features a new area to explore with four new maps, new unlockable towers, weapons and perks.

*New Playable Character - TSYGAN, the “Rogue Insurgent”
*4 New Unique Maps – adding refreshing new tactics and replayability.
*2 Weapons - Rapid-firing Gatling Laser & TSYGANs own handheld Ballista!
*2 Towers - Range Spire that dramatically increases the range of nearby offensive towers and the Slow Field Dispenser letting you strengthen your choke points further!
*Enhanced Enemies - From new support monsters that heal and mutate the attacking horde to a brand new aerial enemy boss, players should be prepared for this heightened challenge.
*Additional Perks – Customize your character even more with six new perks, including a perk that gives you an in-game pet robot that will fight for you!

name: Save the World
summary: In a world plagued by conflict, greed, and division, hope arrives from beyond the stars. The aliens have come to Earth, and they're listening to everything you say and make it a reality. What will you do with all this sudden power? Will you be able to save the world?

name: Sapo 3D
summary: A 3D/Pixel-Art Platformer With Classic Elements Where You Will Control an Acrobat Frog. Collect Golden Flies to Unlock New Worlds, Levels and Other Surprises.

name: Saints Row: Idols Anarchy Pack
summary: Don the iconic digitized DJ Helmet to light up your enemies faces before smashing them unconscious with the Idols Twinkle Bat, all to the sound of broken glass, before speeding off on your stolen neon-illuminated Sandstorm Scrambler bike.

name: Sarab 2: Thalj Mountains
summary: Sarab 2: Thalj Mountains is a JRPG-styled game which focuses on story-telling, exploration and turn-based battling. Each main character has its own mysterious story. Furthermore, the game has a unique atmosphere which absolutely makes it a different experience in comparison to other JRPG games.

name: Saints Row: Saints Criminal Customs
summary: The Saints Criminal Customs includes two specially adorned bonus items; the elaborately styled Saints Custom Convertible and the equally signature Saints Custom Stab Jacket.

name: Saiki Kusuo no Psi Nan: Shijou Psi Dai no Psi Nan!?
summary: A game based on the The Disastrous Life of Saiki K. manga/anime series.

name: Savage Worlds
summary: Savage Worlds is a Pen and Paper system that allows players and GMs the flexibility to run a game in any setting they want.

name: Satori
summary: SATORI is a flow-inducing first-person platformer -- wall-run, air-dash, grapple-swing, and rail-grind through infinitely generated open worlds and experience the freedom of meditative free-running.

name: Sands of Salzaar
summary:
This is an Open World Roleplaying game set in a fantastical desert.The world has descended into darkness and chaos after the Battle of the Blood Moon. Take control of different characters and come up with your own strategy to shape the future of your world. 
 
The game was updated to support English Language on 22nd September 2020.

name: SamuraiZero
summary: Samurai Zero is a Platformer with various mechanics of passing, from runner to slasher, from training your attentiveness to concentrated reaction, all this is seasoned with the old-school effect of old TVs, creating a unique atmosphere and mood.

name: Saints Row: Hexy Halloween Free Cosmetic Pack
summary: Who says Saints can't be sinners? Stalk (or fly) the streets of Santo Ileso with this huge collection of devilish Halloween cosmetics.

name: Satan Moans
summary: Are you ready for an adrenaline-fueled adventure with "Satan Moans"? In this horror-packed game, you'll explore the supernatural events surrounding a teenager returning home in the dead of night. Are you ready to dive into a suspenseful universe?

name: Santa Claus Goblins Attack
summary: Help Santa Claus save Christmas from the terrible Goblins.

name: Samurai Kid
summary: Samurai Kid is an Action game, developed by Biox and published by Koei, which was released in Japan in 2001

name: Saints Row: Chicken Dinner Cosmetic Pack
summary: Everyone’s a winner with this calorie-tastic Cosmetic Pack celebrating one of Santo Ileso’s finest eateries. They say you are what you eat, so your Boss should feel right at home kitted out head-to-toe like the mascot of Ned’s Diner!

name: Salaryman Rescue!
summary: Dive into VR-exclusive Salaryman RESCUE!, a puzzle-management game set in the neon streets of Tokyo. Guide inebriated salarymen to safety, manipulate coin-operated machines, dodge bustling traffic, and thwart UFO abductions, all while soaking in the unique citypop atmosphere!

name: Saints Row: Going Commando Cosmetic Pack
summary: Steal in style with the Going Commando Cosmetic Pack. Get sneaky with a new Boss outfit and tactical weapon, and give those explosive heists a touch of class. You may be a criminal but you’re still a professional, right?!

name: Saints Row: Los Panteros American Muscle Bundle
summary: Pummel your enemies in style with this customized heavy duty gear. Cruise round Santo Ileso on the blazing orange custom Panteros Motorocycle. If anyone dares to get in your way, hop offf and hit them hard with the 'El Lanzador' dual-handed high impact slugger.

name: Satan
summary: Experience the thrill of retro boomer shooters in this action-packed game where you'll battle hordes of demons and face the ultimate challenge: Satan himself. Relive the glory days of classic shooters with intense gameplay, a variety of weapons, and relentless enemies.

name: Savior Quest
summary: "Savior Quest" is an ARPG with a behind the scenes perspective. By taking missions in the main city and challenging various powerful boss, players can obtain random equipment with various entries.

name: Sacrifice For Sale
summary: A unique choice heavy visual novel that you won't find anywhere else! Escape your grim fate, by arguing your case... Learn about the cultists who hold you captive, dismantle the cult, manipulate them- all to not end up as their next sacrifice!

name: Salacot Jack: Deluxe
summary: Fun puzzle and action arcade game.

name: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise 8: Shin Umi Monogatari
summary: Pachinko Paradise 8 is one of the many titles in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features a faithful 3D recreation of the CR Shin Umi Monogatari M27 pachinko machine made by Sanyo Bussan. There are two modes available: Tsūjō (Normal) mode allows the player to modify a wide range of settings for each machine, while Jissen (Battle) mode challenges the player to win as many balls as possible on the default settings with a limited starting pool and time limit. There is also a View mode where the various animations that play on the in-game display can be freely viewed.

name: Save Dash
summary: Hardcore one-touch running game for android and ios platform developed by 10ravens.

name: Safari Toy Factory
summary: When being a child, everyone dreams of having a small elephant or lion, to be his best friend, to take care of him. You decide to go to the jungle to the toys producing factory . You have to prove that you can create jungle toys, collect and pack the toys into their boxes for sale.

name: Sapphire City Part 3
summary: Beware the Horrors of the Future

name: Sauna Simulator
summary: Run your own sauna: buy a room, equip it with an oven and start earning money from it. Hire employees, ensure safety and, of course, have fun!

name: Sargon III
summary: Third in a series of chess games.

name: Saimai Rd
summary: Grow a city with your transport system in this minimal logistic management game!

name: Sasuke vs. Commander
summary: Released by SNK in 1980, it was an early shoot 'em up that featured human characters on foot instead of vehicles, spacecraft, or aliens. The player character faces off against multiple shuriken-throwing ninjas and along the way faces several bosses, such as a flame-shooting shinobi.

name: Sandwich Sudoku
summary: In Sandwich Sudoku, the puzzle is presented with extra numbers outside the grid next to each row and column. These numbers indicate the SUM of cells sandwiched between the 1 and the 9 in that row/column. The logic required to solve the puzzles will appeal to anyone who enjoys normal sudoku and a bit of basic maths. Each puzzle here has been lovingly hand-crafted by Mark Goodliffe and Simon Anthony, the hosts of Cracking The Cryptic. They've even included their own hints on each puzzle to help if you get stuck. Mark and Simon have both represented the UK many times in the World Sudoku Championship.

name: Sands of Supremacy
summary: Sands of Supremacy is a singleplayer, side-scrolling strategy/resource management hybrid 2D game set in a desert landscape on an unknown, futuristic planet. The game combines survival, strategy, and resource management elements to create a challenging and engaging gameplay experience.

name: Save the Goombas
summary: Use the mouse to break stuff and press switches in order to get all the Goombas to reach the goal.

name: Samurai Warriors 4: Empires
summary: Sengoku Musou 4: Empires is the third Samurai Warriors Empires title. The gameplay will focus more on strategy as in other Empires expansions, with players issuing commands and taking suggestions to and from their subordinate military officers. Samurai Warriors 4-II serves as the game's base for featured characters, action, and visuals. The overall concept is to present "the ultimate Warriors conquest simulator". In a response to fan feedback, this game will reuse qualities from the first Empires title. Developers from the Nobunaga's Ambition series have worked on the simulation parts of this game. No new playable characters are appearing, but the number of character events are heightened throughout the game.

name: SaGa Frontier
summary:
Enter a vast frontier where seven quests are taken one hero at a time.

A wizard's dark destiny, a woman's revenge, even a robot's search for his soul, Seven amazing adventures that weave into one - yours.

name: Samurai Katana Rampage: Stickman Saga
summary: Unleash Your Inner Samurai: Seek Justice with the Power of the Katana!

name: Sakura MMO 2
summary: Viola’s quest in the land of Asaph continues. Supported by her party of cute girls, she tries to learn who summoned her to Asaph, and why. Will she finally uncover the truth?

name: Satisfaction Drone
summary:
The party has ended.

Orion & Artemis, an odd pair consisting of a large cyborg and her still-human friend, go home together after a pleasant night out. Orion is wrapped around Artemis’s little finger once again. But what happens when she’s wound too tight?

SATISFACTION DRONE is a short & messy kinetic story with uncomfortable friends-with-benefits lesbianism and semiviolent robot sex. Adults only!

name: Santa's Workshop: Unhinged
summary: Help! Santa's Toy Machine Broke! Quick, find places to get rid of all the presents before it's too late and the room fills up with too many of them!!!

name: Safety Driving Simulator: Car
summary: Safety Driving Simulator: Car is a driving simulator engaging and enjoyable that teaches the basics of driving immersing the player in a detailed and realistic urban environment.

name: Santa Jump
summary: Santa Jump is a 2D side-scrolling arcade platformer about Santa giving out gifts to all the kids for the holiday. For a larger area of coverage, he needs to climb higher and higher, jumping on platforms.

name: Saints Row: Total Control
summary: Saints Row-based game on Facebook and developed by Punch Entertainment.

name: Saiyuki Reload: Gunlock
summary: Saiyuki Reload: Gunlock is an Action game, published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Sally's Salon: Beauty Secrets
summary: Treat yourself to Sally's Salon - Beauty Secrets and catch up with your favorite beautician. She and her new sidekick François are making the town a little more beautiful, one treatment at a time - but when Sally's favorite singer Julio plans to visit the town, she finds herself caught up in a romantic adventure. See what happens in Sally's Salon - Beauty Secrets.

name: Samurai's Zenith: Shifting of the Guard
summary: A mystical heartfelt adventure for those of all ages. Action combat, quests, and custom combos keeps your logic brain satisfied, while the atmosphere and characters spark the interest of your right brain.

name: Salad Bar Tycoon: Extended Edition
